En la actualidad ella tiene la necesidad de comprar un enfriador y licor para vender en su negocio, por esto se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para realizar dicha inversión ya que carece de recursos propios. Su mayor anhelo es que sus ingresos aumenten y mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alba Luz is 53 years old. She has gone through some very painful situations in her life. She suffered through the death of her parents, which was the most difficult thing. Because of this, she needed to move to the city seeking better ways to make a living. That is how she began to make and sell lunches.Thanks to her efforts, today she has a business that supports her daily. Right now, she needs to buy a refrigerator and liquor to sell in her business. That is why she is asking for a loan to make that investment, since she lacks the resources. Her biggest wish is for her income to increase and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy assets and some materials (a refrigerator and liquor).

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer de 35 años de edad, madre soltera, llena de sueños y con una mirada hacia el futuro prometedora. Desde hace 15 años ha laborado como operaria en diferentes talleres de la ciudad. Pero hoy tiene la convicción de montar su propio taller, el cual trabajará en conjunto con su hija de 18 años. Para cumplir su sueño ella necesita comprar una fileteadora pero no cuenta con el dinero para realizar esta inversión, por lo cual solicita un crédito con el que comenzará a materializar su proyecto de empresa.
“Mi madre es una mujer soñadora que siempre anda en búsqueda de lo mejor para mi, por esto en mi tiempo libre me dedico a aprender a su lado”. Estas son las palabras de su hija, la cual se siente muy orgullosa de su madre y espera que su negocio pueda convertirse algún día en una gran empresa.
texts.en:
Diana, 35, is a single mother, full of dreams and with a positive outlook. She has been working as a machine operator in different workshops in the city for fifteen years. However, she is now thinking of starting her own workshop, together with her 18-year-old daughter. In order to make her dream come true, she needs to buy an overlock machine, but she does not have the money required to make this investment. For this reason, she is requesting a loan with which she will realize her enterprise project.

"My mother is a dreamer, she is always striving to give me the best, and this is why I spend my free time next to her, learning from her". These are her daughter’s words, who feels proud of Diana and hopes that her business can one day become a large company.

loans.use: to buy an overlock machine.

loans.name: Jair Darien

texts.es: Jair, es un hombre de 37 años de edad, al que le ha tocado ser madre y padre de su hijo de 11 años, después de sufrir el abandono de su esposa. “Mi hijo es mi mayor motivación, por él es quien me levanto cada día a abrir mi tienda de billar”. Con estas palabras Jair expresa la razón de tantos sacrificios que tiene que padecer cada día. Su mayor sueño es poderle brindar a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida, que pueda acceder al colegio como cualquier niño de su edad. Hoy anda en búsqueda de mejorar su situación económica y para ello ha recurrido a un préstamo el cual invertirá en surtido para la temporada de fin de año, periodo en el que se incrementan las ventas en su negocio.
texts.en: Jair is a 37 year old man who has had to be both mother and father to his 11 year old son after his wife left him. “My son is my biggest motivation, and that is why I get up every day to open my billiard's store". With these words, Jair expresses the reason for so much sacrifice that he has to do every day. His biggest dream is to offer his son a better quality of life so he can access school like any boy his age. Today he seeks to improve his financial situation and for that he has turned to a loan which he will invest in merchandise for the end of the year season, when his sales increase.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: María Aidé

texts.es: María Aidé vive junto a su compañero de vida, sus hijos y sus nietos; ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, lociones, cremas, cosméticos, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y en forma ambulante, es muy conocida en el lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues  todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, para complementar los gastos del hogar tambien vende ropa en variedad; María es una mujer emprendedora, visionaria siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que la lleven al éxito, quiere hacer crecer el negocio y planea invertir en insumos, pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos, perfumes, cremas etc. María Aidé tiene la experiencia crediticia y muy buenas recomendaciones, tiene la certeza que podrá saldar su financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merece.
texts.en: María Aidé lives with her life's companion, and her children and grandchildren. She sells person use products such as lotions, creams, and cosmetics. She has had this business for several years and it has given her a lot of experience that allows her to make better earnings. She sells from her home and door to door. She is well known in the area and has gained many customers. Everything she sells is top quality and at accessible prices and the service is excellent. To add to the household budget she also sells a variety of clothes. María is an enterprising woman, a visionary who is always waiting for new opportunities that will take her to sucess. She wants to grow her business and plans to invest in materials, but she needs capital and that is why she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy cosmetics, perfumes, creams etc. María Aidé has credit experience and very good recommendations. She is sure she can pay off her loan and at the same time give her family the quality of life it deserves.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfume and creams.

loans.name: Elida Yesica

texts.es: Elida Yesica vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la producción y venta de dulces típicos, de leche, tamarindo, nance, entre otros, comercia de forma ambulante y desde su vivienda en una zona muy concurrida de personas, tiene varios años con la venta y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permita obtener las mejores ganancias ya tiene  mucha clientela fija porque es una excelente vendedora y porque todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad cuando atiende el negocio; Elida es una mujer ejemplar, siempre dedicada a su labor y a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan superarse y alcanzar el éxito en el futuro; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar leche, tamarindo, nance, azúcar, etc. Elida Yesica tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elida Yesica lives with her life partner and her children in her own house.  She earns a living making and selling traditional candy made of caramel, tamarind, and nance fruit, among others.  She sells on foot and from home in a very busy area.

She has had the business for several years and has acquired a lot of experience, which allows her to get the best profits.  She has a lot of steady customers because she's an excellent saleswoman and because everything she sells is of good quality at affordable prices.  Also, she's known for her pleasantness when she does business.

Elida's an exemplary woman, always dedicated to her job and waiting for opportunities to improve herself and be successful in the future.  She wants to make her business grow but needs to invest, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy milk, tamarind, nance fruit, sugar, etc.

Elida Yesica has good a good credit record and is confident that she'll be able to pay back her debt and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk, tamarind, nance fruit, and sugar

loans.name: Leidy Tatiana

texts.es:
Leidy Tatiana es una joven que se ha ganado la admiración de su familia, a sus 20 años ya comienza a proyectarse como una mujer de negocios. En  la sala de su casa decidió montar un café internet y videojuegos, con el propósito de financiar sus estudios en la universidad. Desea ser una gran profesional pero no cuenta con un apoyo económico y por eso decidió mirar una fuente de ingresos. “Lo importante es tener claro que es lo que se quiere en la vida, lo demás  se va dando en el  camino” con estas frases Leidy cuenta que llegará a convertirse en la mejor profesional y que no importa que sacrificios tenga que hacer pero que conseguirá realizar su sueño.
En estos momentos se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que financiará la compra de los equipos de cómputo y el video juego, ya que no cuenta con recursos propios para realizar esta inversión.
texts.en:
Leidy Tatiana is a young woman who has earned the admiration of her family as at only 20 years old she is already revealing herself as a business woman. She decided to set up an internet and gaming café in her living room with the aim of financing her university studies. 

She hopes to be a great professional but doesn't have any financial backing and so decided to look for a source of income. "The most important thing is to clearly know what you want in life. You will work out the rest on the way". With these phrases Leidy says that she will become the best professional and that it doesn't matter what sacrifices she has to take, she will see her dream come true. 

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan to finance the purchase of the computer and video game equipment as she doesn't have any of her own resources to invest.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Rubenia De Jesús

texts.es: Rubenia de Jesús  de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella posee una taller de costura, donde confecciona todo tipo de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, elabora las mejores prendas con material de primera calidad y la vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único Rubenia siempre está a la orden de las personas que la visitan, ademas para complementar los gastos del hogar vende cosmeticos; Rubenia es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, su meta  es luchar con esfuerzo y dedicación para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar las ganancias de su negocio por eso invertirá para aumentar la producción y necesita de capital por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, tela por mayor, hilos, agujas, etc. Rubenia de Jesús tiene buenas referencias de pago, es responsable y con una moral intachable sabe con seguridad que saldara el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rubenia de Jesús, 32, lives with her life partner and children.  She has a tailor shop where she makes all types of garments for women, men, and children.  She has been in this business for many years and has a lot of experience.  She's well known in the area and has acquired a lot of customers.  She makes the best garments with top-quality materials and sells at affordable prices.  Also, her service is extraordinary.  Rubenia is always ready to serve her visitors.  To supplement the household expenses, she also sells cosmetics.

Rubenia's an enterprising woman who wants to get ahead.  Her goal is to strive for success with effort and dedication.  She wants to increase the profits of her business, so she'll invest to increase production.

She needs capital, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric wholesale, thread, needles, etc.

Rubenia de Jesús has a good credit record.  She's responsible and has impeccable morals, and knows with certainty that she'll pay back the loan as well as be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale, thread, needles, and cosmetics

loans.name: Dante

texts.en: Dante is a 39-year-old farmer. He has been planting and harvesting rice for over 10 years now. He sustains his family through his income from selling the raised crops. He has six children, and two attend school. Dante would like to improve his crop; that is why he is asking for a loan to invest in his rice field. He is asking for PHP 20,000 to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use on his farm. He hopes to keep achieving abundant harvests to maintain the business and generate good profits for his family.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use on his farm.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en: Living a fortunate life is what Jesus, above, wants for his family. He is a farmer who lives at Amulung with his wife and four children. He is now 45 years old and has been planting and harvesting rice to sell for over 10 years. He usually earns about PHP 20,000 each harvest season and it goes toward meals and education fees for his children. Jesus is now asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming. This loan will help nourish his crops and someday allow him to harvest them profitably. With the additional income generated, he will continue to pay school fees, and someday hopes to be happy and proud to see his children as professionals in their chosen careers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming

loans.name: Luz Marleny

texts.es: Luz Marleny, de 47 años de edad, siempre anda en búsqueda de nuevas oportunidades de negocio, pues es madre soltera y necesita traer a casa el pan de cada día. Es una mujer emprendedora que encuentra en cada dificultad una oportunidad de salir adelante. Debido a la carencia de empleo ella tomó la decisión de vender productos puerta a puerta en su barrio. Su mayor sueño es poder montar en su casa un negocio que le proporcione lo necesario para vivir y no tener que desplazarse cada día cientos de kilómetros para vender su mercancía. Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un crédito para comprar los productos que comercializará y generar mayores ingresos que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz Marleny, aged 47, is always looking for new business opportunities as she is a single mother and needs to put bread on the table each day. She is an entrepreneurial woman who finds an opportunity to get ahead in every difficulty. 

Due to the lack of work, she took the decision to sell products door to door in her area. Her biggest dream is to be able to set up a business in her home which provides enough to live on so she doesn't have to travel hundreds of kilometres every day to sell her products. 

Right now, she is requesting a loan to buy products to sell and generate more income from which will give her a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Manuel Salvador

texts.es: Manuel  de 54 años de edad es un gran emprendedor, es oficial de construcción pero debido a la carencia de empleo se vio en la necesidad de dedicarse a otra actividad.  Por lo cual abrió una cafetería que le proporcionará una entrada económica para poderle ofrecer a sus hijos una educación. Se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que le permita comprar surtido para su negocio, ya que sus clientes se lo demandan. Desea poder adecuar el local con el fin de que sus ingresos mejoren y su calidad de vida cambie.
texts.en: Manuel is 54 years old and very enterprising.  He is a construction foreman but because jobs were scarce he saw the need to look for something else, so he opened a café.  This provides him financial benefits so that he can provide an education for his children.  He is asking for a loan so that he can supply his business and meet his customers’ demands.  He wants to be able to set up a stall so that his income and quality of life increase.

loans.use: to supply his business.

loans.name: Mavisley

texts.es: Mavisley de 28 años de edad es una guerrera, que piensa en grande. Tiene claro que sus hijos necesitan de ella para salir adelante, y por eso se rebusca la vida con el oficio que aprendió desde su juventud. Cansada de soportar humillaciones por parte de sus compañeras de trabajo por su color de piel, decidió retirarse del salón de belleza donde laboraba y montar uno propio en la sala de su casa, en donde les dedica más tiempo a sus dos hijos de 6 y 2 años de edad. Mavisley necesita un crédito para comprar los insumos en su peluquería, debido a que carece de recursos propios. Su mayor sueño es que su salón de belleza sea reconocido y el número de clientes aumente, para que su ingresos también crezcan y poderle brindar a sus pequeños  todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
texts.en:
Mavisley is 28 years old. She is a fighter who thinks big. She understands that her children need her in order to get ahead and therefore she earns a living doing what she learnt when she was young. Tired of putting up with humiliating comments from her work colleagues over the colour of her skin, she decided to leave the beauty salon where she was working and set up her own in her living room where she can dedicate more time to her children, aged 6 and 2 years old. 

Mavisley needs a loan to buy products for her salon due to the lack of her own resources. Her biggest dream is that her beauty salon is recognised and that the number of clients increases so that her income also increases and she can give her little ones everything that she wasn't able to have.

loans.use: to buy beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Edilson Iván

texts.es: Edison de 28 años de edad, nació en el seno de una familia humilde, lleno de carencias y necesidades. Ésta situación lo impulsó a dejar su casa e ir en búsqueda de oportunidades de trabajo. De este modo logró reunir un dinero con el que empezó a vender legumbre, con el transcurrir del tiempo y la disciplina de este joven, logró montar su negocio, el cual se ha convertido en su sustento de vida y de su familia. Tiene dos hijos de 3 y 5 años a los que espera poderles ofrecer una vida digna y una buena educación. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido, debido a que la demanda en fin de año se incrementa y los clientes se lo exigen.
texts.en:
Edison is 28 years old. He was born into a humble family, full of needs and necessities. This situation drove him to leave home and go looking for work opportunities. Through this he managed to save some money with which he started to sell vegetables and with time and this young man's discipline he was able to set up his own business which provides for him and his family. He has two children aged 3 and 5 who he hopes to be able to offer a decent life and good education.

He is asking for a loan to buy a range of products due to the increased demand at the end of the year from his customers.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy is 27 years old, single and lives with his parents at Amulung. He has a farming business which he has been managing for 10 years now. He plants and harvests rice to sell. He usually earns PHP 15,000 each harvest season, twice a year. He uses his income to provide sustenance to his family and as capital for the business too. 

Jimmy is now asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs associated with the farming business such as tilling the land and sowing rice seeds. In the future, he would like to keep making his farm productive and save for his parents’ needs, especially as they are getting weak and old. It will help him achieve economic stability someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs

loans.name: Jorge Omar

texts.es: Jorge de 40 años de edad, está casado y tiene 2 hijos. Su familia es el motor de su vida y es por ellos que no le importa tener que trabajar los siete días a la semana con tal de poderle ofrecer a su familia un vida digna. Omar sueña con tener un almacén y poder compartir más tiempo con sus hijos. Pero es consciente que en el momento no cuenta con los recursos para materializar su sueño. Actualmente se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de más surtido para ampliar su portafolio de productos y generar mayores ingresos para su casa.
texts.en:
Jorge is 40 years old, married and has two children. His family is the driving force in his life and because of them he doesn't mind having to work seven days a week in order to be able to give his family a decent life.

Jorge dreams of having a shop and having more time to spend with his children. But he is aware that at the moment he doesn't have the resources to make his dream come true. 

Right now he is looking for a loan which he will invest in the purchase of more stock to broaden his portfolio of products and generate more income for his household.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 34 years old and engages in selling kakanin and other prepared foods in her village, as well as buying and selling fruits and vegetables. She makes rice cakes, puto and bibingka every market day and sells them with banana, pechay, cabbage, avocado and ginger. Her kakanin adds to her income, so she patiently sleeps late in the evening and wakes up early in the morning to prepare it. She knows that through her hard work plus her continuously revolving capital, she will achieve a good standard of living with her family someday.  

But for 17 years in this business Nora has often experienced delayed payments by her clients. So sometimes she lacks working capital, and this has caused her to request a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy tomatoes, onions, garlic and malagkit rice as additional products to sell. She hopes that she will improve her business with the capital from ASKI, and will also be able to lift her family out of poverty and help her four children with their education.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, garlic and malagkit rice as additional products to sell

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es: Luisa es una joven de 20 años de edad, amante a la decoración y con un gran talento hacia el arte. Desde que cumplió la mayoría de edad ha laborado, debido a que debe aportar  a las obligaciones del hogar y pagarse sus estudios universitarios. Hace 6 mese se quedó sin empleo y gracias a la idea de un amigo comenzó a trabajar con artesanías explotando su gran talento. En la actualidad se siente inmensamente feliz por la oportunidad que la vida de dio de ser una microempresaria. Se encuentra en búsqueda de un préstamo con el que comprará una máquina que necesita para la elaboración de su producto. Su mayor sueño es poderse graduar de la universidad y ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luisa is a 20 year old young woman.  She loves decoration, and she has a great talent for art.  Ever since she was old enough, she has worked.  This is because she needs to contribute to the household obligations and pay for her university studies.

Six months ago she was left without employment.  Thanks to a friend’s idea, she started taking advantage of her great talent to work with handicrafts.  She is now extremely happy for the opportunity life gave her to be a small businesswoman.

She is looking for a loan to buy a machine she needs to make her product.  Her biggest dream is to be able to graduate from the university and to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make her handicrafts.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a humble business owner in Gattaran, Cagayan. She is widowed and an industrious mother of two children. To help her children, she creates her own source of income. She only has a high school level of education but she has had the courage to pursue her dream business and to hold on to the dream of sending her children to school until they finish their college education. Now, her business has already been operating for five years and it has slowly been developing well. 

Marilou is seeking additional working capital in order to make changes to her business. A loan of PHP 30,000 will be a great help to her. It will be used to purchase soft drinks, snacks, and school supplies such as notebooks and paper, since her business is located near a school. She hopes that generous people will help her to borrow the requested amount.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, snacks, and school supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es: María Antonia de 29 años de edad, es una mujer dedicada a sus hijos,  comprometida con su bienestar y cuidado, por ello decidió buscar una actividad que le permitiera pasar la mayor parte del tiempo con ellos y al mismo tiempo generar ingresos para su casa debido  a que es madre cabeza de familia. Desea dedicarse a la venta de ropa desde su hogar pero no cuenta con el capital para comenzar con su negocio, por esto a recurrido a un crédito con el que comprará mercancía. Su mayor sueño es poder compartir con sus hijos cada instante que le sea posible porque esta es la fuente de su existencia.
texts.en:
María Antoia, age 29, is devoted to her children, and she is committed to their care and well-being.  She therefore decided to look for a business activity that would allow her so spend most of her time with them, and, at the same time, generate income for her house.  This is because she is a mother who is the head of her family.

She wants to sell clothes from her house, but she does not have the capital to start her business.  That is why she has turned to a loan, which she will use to buy merchandise.

Her biggest dream is to be able to share each moment possible with her children because they are her fountain of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
Leticia has been a simple businesswoman of Gonzaga, Cagayan, for seven years. A grocery industry is the only source of her income, and this is very difficult for her because she can't afford the demands of one family. Her profit is not enough to provide for the needs of her family’s demand (seven children). But despite the hardship of life, she sees the brightness of the other side. 

She found ASKI as her partner in improving her business to become more productive. She is now asking for a loan amount of 30,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to purchase additional grocery items such as salt, cup noodles, fish paste, straw, breads, biscuits and canned goods. 

She said that she is fortunate that she has ASKI to help her, and most of all, she has our Almighty God that leads her into this organization. She hopes that Kiva lenders will provide more funds to help others in order to lift their beloved family from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items such as salt, cup noodles, fish paste, straw, breads, biscuits and canned goods.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha de 32 años de edad se ha convertido en una microempresaria gracias al esfuerzo de su trabajo, cuenta con un quiosco de madera ubicado en el parque de su municipio.  Local que le ha dado el sustento a ella y a su familia conformada por sus dos hijos y su esposo. Martha desea ampliar la variedad de productos que ofrece en su tienda y mejorar sus locaciones. Actualmente no cuenta con el dinero para financiar estas mejoras y ha decidido buscar un crédito. Su mayor deseo es poder incrementar sus ventas porque con ello podrá garantizarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Martha is 32 years old and has converted her small business thanks to her hard work.  She has a wooden kiosk located in the municipal park and this has allowed her to support her family; her children and husband.  Martha wants to expand the variety of products that she offers in her store and find a better location, but she doesn’t have the money to make these improvements so she has requested a loan.  Her greatest desire is to be able to increase her sales because she will be able to provide a better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia is a 50-year-old high school graduate who operates a sari-sari store (variety store). She is thankful that she completed high school because she knows how to manage her own business. She has been engaged in this business for 20 years. The profits from her business have helped to pay for the education expenses for her four children. She also plans to sell bananas. She is seeking a loan for 40,000 PHP to buy groceries such as sugar, noodles, and biscuits to stock in her store and bananas to sell in the market every market day. Cecilia will work harder for her businesses to earn a higher income. She hopes that her wish loan will be granted.

loans.use: to buy groceries such as sugar, noodles, biscuits, and bananas

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de 61 años de edad, lo que le sobran son ganas de trabajar,  cuenta que siempre ha tenido algo que hacer y que quedarse en la casa no es lo que prefiere, además que su familia depende de lo que él pueda conseguir. Actualmente tiene una cafetería en la que trabaja de 6 de la mañana a 7 de la noche todos los días. Sueña con poder tener un día su negocio bien surtido, por lo cual ha recurrido a un crédito para comprar algunos artículos que le hacen falta a su negocio.
texts.en: Miguel Angel is 61 years old and has energy to spare for work. He has always had something to do and staying at home is not what he prefers. His family depends on what he can provide for them. Currently, he has a cafeteria where he works from 6:00AM to 7:00PM every night. He dreams of having his business well-stocked one day, which is why he will use the loan to purchase an assortment of items that his business needs.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of items.

loans.name: Felanie

texts.en: Felanie manages a candy-making business that generates a monthly income of PHP 5,000. She delivers her products every day on a bicycle. She has been in this business for over a year. Felanie is aiming to increase the volume of her products but her capital is lacking due to household expenses and delayed payments by her customers. For her to reach her goal, she is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase sugar, milk, cocoa milk and yeast. Part of the loan will also be used to purchase flour to make miki (noodles) for snacks. She hopes that she can obtain the loan amount requested. She believes that despite the situation she has gone through, some day she can attain success for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, milk, cocoa milk and yeast. Part of the loan will also be used to purchase flour to make miki (noodles) for snacks.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en: Julita has managed her sari-sari (convenience store) business for over 30 years. She is 55 years old and a widow. She is earning PHP 6,000 a month and currently spends her income on basic necessities. She would like to increase her profit to improve her living situation as well as her business. To achieve her dream, she is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy grocery items such as sugar, coffee, cooking oil and soft drinks. She hopes that she will get her requested loan amount.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as sugar, coffee, cooking oil and soft drinks

loans.name: Estrelita

texts.en: Estrelita is 56 years old and widowed with five children. She has been a grocery store owner for over 25 years. She is earning PHP 7,000 a month which is not enough to support her family. Despite this, she continues working hard in order to earn a higher income. She is requesting a loan amount PHP 50,000 to buy groceries such as biscuits and canned goods and soft drinks, and dry goods, such as slippers, as additional items to sell. She hopes to earn a higher income so that she can cover all the expenses of her five children. Regardless of hardship in finding money, she’s not giving up. She strives instead to provide for the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy groceries, such as biscuits and canned goods and soft drinks, and dry goods, such as slippers, as additional items to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy notebooks, paper, pens, etc.

loans.name: Arcely

texts.en: Arcely is a 38-year-old single mother who sells different kinds of snacks that she makes every day. She has been in operation for eight years. She works hard just to meet the needs of her two children. She is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 (Philippine pesos) to buy cassava, flour, sugar, malagkit rice and milk. She hopes to increase her profits so that she can meet the financial needs and educational needs of her family, improve their poor living conditions and save for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy cassava, flour, sugar, malagkit rice and milk.

loans.name: Janeth

texts.en: As a mother and breadwinner, Janeth works hard to improve her family's standard of living. To earn a living, she is engaged in a hog-raising business. The main source of income for the business comes from raising hogs for sale. She has been in this business for five years. She earns about PHP 7,000 per hog after fattening them. As of now, Janeth is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs. She hopes that she can get the amount she requested in order to further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs.

loans.name: Clark

texts.en:
Clark lives with his wife and two children in the village of Sta. Rosa. He is engaged in the farming business, particularly raising rice crops. He has been planting rice crops for five years. He is thankful because his previous loan had helped him much, most especially in making his rice field more productive.

Clark would like to keep improving his rice field, so he is requesting another loan amount of PHP 40,000, which will be used in buying farm supplies such as fertilizer and insecticides. He knows that through implementation of proper plant care for his crops, he could further gain a better profit, which will enable him to educate his two children and improve their way of living.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer and insecticides for his farming business.

loans.name: Rosa Elida

texts.es: Rosa Elida de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, huevos, leche, pan entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse al comercio y ya tiene mucha experiencia, su tienda está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, comercia para todas las personas del lugar y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija porque todos los productos que vende son de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es único siempre está a la orden de las personas; Rosa es una mujer trabajadora, dispuesta a superarse, está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades para lograr alcanzar un futuro con éxito, la demanda en el negocio ha aumentado porque los clientes siempre encuentran ahí lo que necesitan, Rosa tiene la idea de invertir más en producto por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un creditito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas etc. Rosa Elida tiene muy buenas referencias de crédito es responsable y con moral impecable, confía que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rosa Elida is 49 years old and lives with her life partner and son in a home of her own.  She has a store where she sells primary needs products such as rice, beans, eggs, milk, bread, and other things.  She has been doing business for several years and has lots of experience.  Her store is located in her home and she has many steady customers because her products are top quality at good prices.  She also gives good service.

Rosa is a hardworking woman prepared to get ahead and ready to take on new opportunities to reach a successful future.  Demand in her business has increased because her customers always find what they need there.  Rosa wants to invest in more merchandise, so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, drinks, etc.  Rosa Elida has good credit references and is of impeccable morality.  She is confident that she can repay the debt and give her family a better life.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong was born in 1987. She has two children and her son is in the second grade. Her daughter is in kindergarten. Her husband and she sell shoes and flip-flops to earn a living. His income is about 6,000,000 dong [VND]. Huong also makes 6,000,000 dong (VND) a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 12,000,000 dong (VND) per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 dong (VND) and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 dong (VND) to buy more shoes and flip-flops to sell.

loans.use: to buy more shoes and flip-flops to sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy was born in 1982. She has two children. The oldest son is 8 years old. The younger son is 10 months old. 

Her husband is an electrician and watering repairer. Thuy sells insurance to earn a living. She has done this job for three years. She gains from it 5,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 9,000,000 VND per month. 

Thuy has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2010. In the last cycle, she borrowed 6,758,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,066,000 VND to earn more money by raising pigs and chickens in her small garden. 

She wants to use her benefit to bring up her children to grow well.

loans.use: to earn more money by raising pigs and chickens in her small garden.

loans.name: Luis Gonzalo

texts.es: Luis Gonzalo de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la compra y  venta de frijol, tiene varios años de poseer este pequeño negocio y ha adquirido mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, lo realiza de manera ambulante y desde su vivienda, ya tiene mucha clientela pues la gente lo prefiere porque llega hasta las puertas de sus hogares con producto de calidad, a un buen precio y sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Luis es un hombre entregado a su labor, dispuesto a trabajar duro para en un futuro alcanzar el éxito, está seguro que solo necesita de constancia y motivación, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita  frijol por mayor. Luis Gonzalo tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago, agrádese y esta muy  contento por el apoyo,  tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Luis Gonzalo is thirty-two years old, lives together with his wife and children, and works selling beans. He has managed this small business for several years and has gained a lot of experience which allows him to obtain the best prices. He works from his home and as a traveling merchant. He already has a strong customer base because people prefer him because he comes straight to their doors, with a high-quality product, at a good price, and above all he provides excellent customer service. Luis is dedicated to his job, given to working hard toward success in the future. He knows all he needs is motivation and perseverance. For these reasons he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase beans at wholesale prices. Luis Gonzalo has a good credit history and good references. He is very grateful and happy for the assistance, and he is certain that he will repay his loan while at the same time giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase beans at wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es: José Francisco de sesenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su hermana, sobrinos y nietos; el posee una taller de costura, donde confecciona todo tipo de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy conocido en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, elabora las mejores prendas con material de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y además con el servicio único José siempre está a la orden de las personas que lo visitan; él es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, su meta  es luchar con esfuerzo y dedicación para alcanzar el éxito, en las ultimas semanas creció la demanda y quiere aumentar las ganancias de su negocio por eso invertirá en materia prima para la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, agujas, etc. José Francisco es responsable con una moral intachable, esta muy contento con la ayuda, sabe con seguridad que saldara el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: José Francisco, 62 years old, lives together with his sister, nephews and nieces, and grandchildren. He has a sewing shop where he makes all types of clothing for women, men, and children. He has been in this business for many years and has so much experience that it allows him good income. He is well known in the area and had many customers. He makes the best clothes with high quality material, at affordable prices. Also with José, unique services are always in demand by the people who visit him. He is a entrepreneurial man with drive to succeed. His goal is to fight with strength and dedication to reach success. In the last weeks demand grew and he wants to grow the profitof his business. For that he will invest in raw material for production but requires capital. For that he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that permits him to buy wholesale cloth, thread, needles etc. José Francisco has responsible moral character. He is very happy with the assistance. He knows with assurance that he will settle the financing and also be able to give his family a plentiful life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale fabric, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Patricia Yolanda

texts.es: Patricia Yolanda  de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y además vende frutas y verduras para completar los gastos del hogar, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite elaborar las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que se prepara es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además con el mejor servicio; Patricia es una mujer activa entregada a su labor, lo que más desea en su vida es cumplir sus sueños, por eso trabaja con mucho esfuerzo sabe que así alcanzara el éxito; desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda y  no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes, es así como decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que le permita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, frutas y verduras por mayor etc. Patricia Yolanda tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, agrádese la colaboración y asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Patricia Yolanda is twenty-nine years old. She lives together with her life partner and her children in their own house. She works selling tortillas, and she also sells fruits and vegetables to cover her household expenses. She has run this business for several years, and she has gained very valuable experience which allows her to make better profits. She sells from her residence, and she has a large customer base, since people know that everything she prepares is of top quality, at affordable prices and also with the best service. Patricia is an active woman and dedicated to her work. What she desires most in life is to fulfill her dreams, and for this reason she is working with great effort. She knows that in this way she will achieve success. Some time ago, the demand started to increase, and she does not want to disappoint her customers. Thus, she decided to increase production, but she needs capital which would permit her to invest in supplies. For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will permit her to buy corn, fruits and vegetables, etc., on a wholesale basis. Patricia Yolanda has excellent credit references and is very responsible. She is grateful for the support and promises to pay off the debt, while at the same time she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, fruits and vegetables on a wholesale basis.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Flordelina

texts.en: Flordelina is married and has two children who currently go to school. She is a sari-sari store owner within her community and her husband works together with her on the business. Flordelina hopes to keep her business strong in order to support and help her two children finish their studies. But as of now, Flordelina struggles with a shortage of capital, so she is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000. Her requested loan will be used to buy cabbages, eggplants, canned goods, noodles and spices to sell. She is hoping to obtain this loan so she can gain a stable source of income.

loans.use: buy items to sell in her store

loans.name: Karen Lissette

texts.es: Karen Lissette de  veintitrés años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa alquilada; ella posee una panadería y vende pan el variedad francés y dulce,  quesadillas, salpores, pastelitos, tortas entre otros, es muy conocido en la zona pues elabora el pan más exquisito del lugar, el rico aroma que se siente cuando el pan está recién hecho atrae mucha clientela y se siente muy satisfecha al ver que las personas se van contentas del lugar, todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, Karen es una mujer visionaria con muchas ganas de ganarse un futuro más próspero, piensa que si tiene un comienzo tendrá la lucha y si tiene la lucha lograra la victoria, ahora está buscando la lucha y quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor,  manteca, jaleas, azúcar, sal, bandejas, etc. Karen  Lissette es muy responsable y con un buen record crediticio tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda pero sobre todo tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Karen Lissette, 23, lives with her life partner and son in a rented house. She has a bakery where she sells French bread, sweet breads, quesadillas, pastries, cakes, and other items. This local bakery is well known for its delicious bread. The smell of freshly baked bread attracts clients who seem very happy that here they can buy fine quality products at reasonable prices and with great service.

Karen is a forward-looking woman who strives for a prosperous future. She believes that if she makes a start, she will face a struggle; if she fights, though, she will attain victory. She is looking to fight now: she wants to grow her business but lacks the capital to do so. She is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy wholesale wheat flour, vegetable shortening, jellies, sugar, salt, and trays. Karen Lissette is very responsible and has a good credit history. She is confident she will be able to pay her debt, but more than anything, she has faith that she will be able to offer her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale wheat flour, vegetable shortening, jellies, sugar, salt, and trays.

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 45-year-old hard-working woman. She lives in Pakistan with her husband, 4 sons, and 3 daughters.  Two of her sons are rickshaw drivers and her husband is a taxi driver.  Though her sons and her husband are earning, still their income is insufficient to meet the family's needs. They are passing through a very difficult time because Nasreen has a big family and more people to eat than earning ones. 

Nasreen is trying to contribute some amount to her family's income by stitching clothes at home. She provides tailor services in her community. Her monthly income is only 500 Pkr. She wants to generate more income by purchasing a new sewing machine. However due to lack of money she is unable to do this. For that, Nasreen as a member of a 7-person lending group, has requested for a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase a sewing machine to stitch more dresses to satisfy the needs of her clients more professionally.  She dreams of giving her children a quality education and a good life.

Note: In the picture Nasreen is holding a passbook in her hands.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Sakina is a 41-year-old married woman who has been doing stitching work for many years. She lives in a one bedroom house with her husband and two children. When her husband failed to find employment Sakina decided to use the skill her mother had taught her at a very young age and earn something for her family. She started sewing for the women in the neighborhood.  Over time she has become famous in her community and demands from her customers are increasing day by day. In order to fulfill orders on time, Sakina contacted Kashf foundation and applied a loan of Rs 25,000 to purchase a new sewing machine and spools of threads in different colors.  She planned to involve her daughter in her business to meet the orders without delay. Sakina is passionate about her work, and informed us that she is planning on preparing fancy dresses so she can sell them to retailers in the city of Lahore.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine and colored threads

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus ocho hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, camisas, pantalones,  vestidos entre otros, tiene  varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante y ya tiene mucho clientela las personas saben que todo lo que vende Irma, es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; es una mujer decidida con muchas ganas de salir adelante, le gusta aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan porque sabe que solo así logrará el éxito; desde hace mucho tiempo quiere aumentar las ventas, pues sabe que así aumentaran sus ganancias, no posee de suficiente capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Irma es muy responsable y tiene excelentes referencias de pago, se siente contenta con la ayuda por lo que asegura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez ofrecerle mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Irma is 40 years of age and lives together with her life companion and her 8 children. She sells clothes, shirts, pants and dresses among other items. She has had her business for several years and she has much experience in sales. She carries out her business as a travelling saleswoman and already has many customers. People know that everything that Irma sells is of very good quality and accessible prices. Also, the service is unsurpassable. She is a woman who is very determined in her desire to get ahead. She likes to take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves because she knows that only in this way will she achieve success. 

For a long time she has wanted to increase sales, since she knows that in this way her profits would increase. She does not have sufficient capital to invest in supplies and because of this is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which would allow her to buy clothes wholesale. Irma is very responsible and has excellent references of payment. She feels happy with the help because she maintains that she will be able to pay off the financing and at the same time offer a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Sobia

texts.en:
Sobia is 26 years old and is a vigorous, married woman. She has expertise in the field of embroidery and has been providing unique and attractive embroidered clothes in her community for 8 years.  She is passionate about her work, and client demand is strong. Her husband is employed as a sales person in a grocery store, but he does not earn enough to support his family and their expenditures are more than their earnings. 

Sobia is contributing a lot to the family income.  Over the time, she has become famous in providing unique embroidery patterns at reasonable rates. 

Sobia is a mother of three children. She wants to grow her business and has requested a loan of Rs 20000 to buy raw materials such as threads, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet with the increasing demand.  She shares that her dream is expanding her business to the local market.

loans.use: buy sewing supplies in large quantities

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en: Through the income from her business, Leticia is able to provide for her two children. She works hard and prays that she can prevail in their struggle in financial matters because most of the time her income, which amounts to PHP 700 daily, is not enough for her family.  Now, she is insistent to ask a loan amount of PHP 18,000 to buy more fish, Styrofoam and additional vegetables to sell.

loans.use: buy fish, styrofoam and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Humberto Nehemias

texts.es: Humberto Nehemías de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; el posee una venta de chocobananos y otros productos helados, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y ya tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas, comercia de forma ambulante en un carretón y se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente pues la gente lo prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable; Humberto es un hombre emprendedor con  muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que se le presentan  sabe que solo así llegara al éxito;  desde hace mucho tiempo quiere hacer crecer su negocio pero no posee del suficiente capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar un nuevo carretón, banano, chocolate etc. Humberto Nehemías tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento, y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Humberto Nehemías, 29, lives with his common-law wife. He sells “chocobananos” [frozen chocolate-covered bananas] and other ice cream products. He has been in the business for many years and has gained experience in sales. He works on the streets from a small cart and he has earned many clients lately because people like getting what they need from him at affordable prices and with unequal service. 

Humberto is an enterprising man who strongly wishes to get ahead. He is always on the lookout for new opportunities that may show up so that he can be successful. He has wanted to expand his business for a long time but has not had the capital required to invest in supplies. He will use the loan requested from INTEGRAL [MFI] to buy a new small cart, bananas, chocolate, etc. 

Humberto Nehemías has good payment references and is very responsible. He’s sure that he can pay off the loan and provide his family with a better quality of life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy a new small cart, bananas, chocolate, etc.

loans.name: Gulnaz's Group

texts.en:
Gulnaz is a 45-year-old hard-working woman. She lives in Pakistan with her husband, son, and 3 daughters. All of her children are students and her husband is an auto mechanic, but his income is inadequate to meet the house hold expenses and to fulfill his family's needs. They are passing through a really difficult time because with the meager salary of her husband it is really hard for her to pay for her children's educational expenses and to meet the house hold expenses as well.

Gulnaz is trying to contribute some amount to her family's income by providing embroidery services in her community. She has excellent embroidery skills and all of her clients appreciate her work. She wants to continue this small business but her stock of embroidery material is finished.  Due to lack of money, she is unable to purchase more materials to continue her embroidery services. For that reason Gulnaz, as a member of 6-person lending group, has requested for a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase embroidery materials like, threads of various colours, needles, clothes, etc. She dreams of giving her children a quality education and a good life. 

Note: In the picture Gulnaz is holding a passbook in her hand.

loans.use: purchase embroidery materials

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Мавчуда  50 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Занимается торговлей детских колясок, одеяло, постельного белья, полотенец и т.п. Ещё она работает завхозом в детском садике. В торговле помогает ей младшая дочь.  Имеет опыт в этой сфере более 10 лет. Мавчуда добросовестная, пунктуальная, порядочная клиентка, сотрудничает с нашей организацией с 2009 года. Муж Мавчуды – таксист. Занимается перевозкой пассажиров. Старший сын Мавчуды женат, у него 3 детей и живет он вместе с родителями. Она  бабушка, и гордится тем, что имея свой бизнес может финансово помогать и поддерживать мужа и детей. На полученный кредит хочет закупить колясок и одеяло и  увеличить ассортимент своего товара. Она благодарна нашей организации за финансовую помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Mavjuda is 50 years old, married and has three children. She sells baby strollers/buggies, comforters, bed sheets, towels etc. She also works as a manager of a day care. Mavjuda's youngest daughter helps her with the store. Mavjuda has more then 10 years experience in retail and is a conscientious, punctual and responsible client who has been working with our organization since 2009. Mavjuda's husband works as a taxi driver and transports passengers. Their eldest son is married with three children and his young family lives with Mavjuda and her husband. Mavjuda is a loving grandmother and is proud that her business can help financially support both her husband and all her children. She is planning to use the current loan to purchase a batch of strollers and blankets and so expand her inventory. She is grateful to KIVA for the financial help and support.

loans.use: to buy buggies/strollers

loans.name: Ana Maricruz

texts.es: Ana Maricruz de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en  casa alquilada, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad frijoles, pan, huevos, bebidas, jabones entre otros, el negocio esta ubicado en su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona se ha hecho de mucha clientela,  tiene ventaja porque no hay mucha competencia en los alrededores,  la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a excelentes precios, además el servicio es muy bueno; Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora siempre dispuesta a cumplir todas las oportunidades que se le presentan para así  alcanzar el éxito, uno de sus más grandes sueños  es acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital que le permita comprar granos básicos, ´productos instantáneo, pan, golosinas, queso, verduras etc. Ana Maricruz tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable sabe que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Maricruz, 52, lives in a rented house with her husband and son.  She owns a store where she sells the kind of merchandise that her  customers need every day: beans, bread, eggs, drinks, soap, etc.  She operates the business from a space in her house and is well known in the neighborhood.  There are only a few other similar businesses nearby, something that's an advantage for her.  She says, too, that her customers come to her because she provides good-quality products at reasonable prices.  Ana is a hard-working woman, always ready to make the most of whatever opportunities come her way, and that's why she's successful.  She wants to grow the business, but she lacks the capital she needs to buy a wider range of products.   Ana is responsible and has good references.  She knows that she can repay the loan and still give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her grocery business.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 43-year-old married woman and a mother of two daughters. She is running a small food stall. She works selling dry fruits, french fries, and sandwiches for children in a place located in the corner of a popular street in her town. She is helping her husband by contributing to the family income through all her hard work. 

For the improvement of her business,  Shamim contacted Kashf Foundation. It’s her second loan cycle and she applied a loan of Rs 25000 to improve her stall by purchasing more ingredients such as packs of oils, salt, flavors, packs of disposable plates, etc. She is hopeful to get boost in her net income and aspires to save enough money to expand her business. She dreams of giving dowries to her daughters on their weddings.

loans.use: buy food items to resell

loans.name: Lela

texts.en:
Lela is from the village of Vardisubani. She is 40 years old and lives with her husband and 18-year-old daughter who is a student. Lela’s husband works as an artisan locally and gets a monthly income. The family is involved in an agricultural business. They run a small dairy farm of two calves and two milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. They sell the dairy from their house. Lela works hard to make some savings and improve the living conditions for her family. 

Lela requested a loan for purchasing milking cows. After the number of cattle is increased, the family will be able to receive more milk for their dairy.  Thus, she wants to expand her business in order to earn a good profit. With increased profits, she will be able to reinvest in her agricultural business, as well as spend more on the family’s daily needs and the living conditions for the family will be improved.

loans.use: purchase milk cows

loans.name: Saeedi

texts.en:
Saeedi is a 45-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for the last eleven years. She offers various goods for daily use. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. Her husband is employed in a small factory but earns insufficient income to support his family alone. 

Saeedi is a mother of six children. She is motivated to provide for her family. As she wants to grow her business, she requested a loan of Rs 40000 to buy stocks of rice and flour from the market at lower rates. She then would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently.  

Saeedi is in her 4th loan cycle and has shown excellent repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize part of revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: buy rice and flour

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his milling machine.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en: Francisco is 56 years old and married with three children. He is a loving and hard-working person. He has grown corn for the past 30 years. It is very viable source of income for him because he cares a lot for his farm. As he began to farm, he gradually got used to the work and added a plot of land to grow corn. Now he is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides to improve his crop production. He wants to provide a better life for his children and be able to feed them well. He continues to move forward to achieve his dream of having a comfortable life. He is hopeful that his loan will result in a more productive farm and that he will be able to continue his business and improve his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his crop

loans.name: Iffat

texts.en:
Iffat is a 37-year-old married hard-working lady.  Her husband is a laboror and doing jobs out of city but his income is not sufficient to meet the expenses of their home. That's why she decided to work to support her family for a better future.  

Two years ago Iffat began stitching work in her house. She sews for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. She provides for 5 children. 

Iffat is currently in her 1st loan cycle and applied a loan of Rs 20,000 to buy raw material including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zippers, etc., to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: buy sewing supplies

loans.name: Stephany Guadalupe

texts.es: Stephany Guadalupe de veinticuatro años de edad vive junto a su hijo, su madre y sus hermanas; Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa camisas, vestidos, pantalones, entre otros, tiene varios años con el pequeño negocio y con eso ha adquirido valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de concentración comercial como en los mercados de los pueblos aledaños, se siente orgullosa porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados, tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad a precios accesibles ero sobre todo con un servicio excelente; Stephany es una mujer dedicada a su labor siempre está dispuesta a aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan para poder llegar al éxito; quiere aumentar sus ventas por eso necesita invertir pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Stephany Guadalupe es  muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Stephany Guadalupe, 24, lives with her son, her mother and brothers and sisters.  She operates a clothing sales business and sells shirts, dresses, trousers, etc.  She has operated the business for a few years now and picked up enough experience to make it profitable.  She sells some clothing to customers who come to her house and other clothing to customers she meets working as a street vendor.  She is proud, she says, of what she has accomplished and credits her success to offering good-quality merchandise at reasonable prices.  More importantly, she adds, she provides her customers with excellent service.  Stephany is a hard-working woman, always ready to make the most of whatever opportunities come her  way.  She doesn't have the capital she needs to grow her business so she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that she will use to buy bulk supplies of clothing.  Stephany is very responsible and has good references.  She is confident that she will be able to repay the debt and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bulk supplies of clothing for her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Eden

texts.en: Eden is 32 years old, married and blessed with two children. She works in a farming business and has been planting corn for over 11 years. It provides the family great financial benefits. She wants to improve their business to receive a good profit. She is now applying for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy seeds and fertilizers and to pay for the labor costs of planting. With the help of the loan, she will be able to gather enough income to lift up her family out of poverty and save for the college education of her children.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers and to pay for the labor costs of planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grains, instant products, sweets, bread, beverages, cheese, and corn.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en: Ms Parveen is a 57-year-old widow. Fifteen years ago, after her husband's death, she faced a very difficult time and was unable to meet the daily needs of her four children. At that time, she decided to start her own business. She started selling items of daily use at the corner of her house. Now she has gained eight years of experience in this field and retained many regular customers. In anticipation of high inflation, she decided to take a 20,000 PKR loan from Kashf Foundation to purchase stock of rice and wheat at wholesale rates. She hopes to cater to more customers time after time and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of rice and wheat at whole sale rates from the market.

loans.name: Carmen Elena

texts.es: Carmen Elena de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y sandalias, tiene en variedad para damas, caballeros y niños, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, blusas entre otros; posee varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite alcanzar las ganancias esperadas, comercia de forma ambulante y desde su hogar, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Carmen es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, desde hace mucho tiempo quiere acrecentar el negocio pero no posee del suficiente capital para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y sandalias. Carmen Elena tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez le darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen Elena is thirty five and lives with her life partner and their children. She makes a living selling clothes and sandals, and has a variety of merchandise for women, men, and children, including shirts, pants, dresses, and blouses. She has been running her business for several years and has gained a lot of sales experience which helps her to achieve her sales targets. She is a mobile vendor and also sells from home and has a lot of customers because people know that she sells good quality and affordable merchandise and also offers excellent customer service. 

Carmen is an enterprising woman with a drive to get ahead in life and she is always looking for opportunites to achieve success. She has been wanting to grow her business for a while, but has not had enough money to invest in supplies. This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy clothes and sandals at wholesale. Carmen Elena  has a good repayment references and is very responsible. She pledges to repay the loan and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes and sandals at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en:
Ahmed is a 44-year-old married man and has 5 children who live in Sana`a, Yemen. He earns a low daily income, which is not enough to cover the family's needs. 

He is requesting for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to cover the cost of purchasing new furniture in order to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy new furniture for his house.

loans.name: Perlito

texts.en:
Perlito is 47 years old and married. He has five children. He grows corn and earned P10,000 last crop. He has been engaged in this activity for over ten years. It is difficult, yet he is very motivated to work because it is for the welfare of his family and improvement of their lives. 

He is requesting a loan of P15,000 to buy farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides. With these inputs and his hard work, he knows that he can gain higher income.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en:
Ms. Shameem is a 39 year-old married woman and a mother of six. She has been working in tailoring for many years to support her family. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the household expenses and the educational needs of the children. That is why she started tailoring at home to better support her family. She, with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

Now she is requesting a loan of 20000 PKR to purchase more spools of thread, packs of buttons, lace, etc. This will help her to meet the increasing demand. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Shameem hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a quality education for her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons, lace, etc.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 52-year-old man from Sana'a, Yemen. He is married and has two children. He owns a small grocery store selling items such as soft drinks, juices, and dairy products. He's built good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a 200,000 YER loan to increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy grocery items like soft drinks, juices, and dairy products for his business

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Ms. Nasreen is a 40-year-old married woman. She has been in the business of stitching clothes for the past four years. Her designs and patterns are very popular in the community. Her husband does labor and does not earn enough to meet his house expenses alone. She has six children; two of them go to school. She is working hard to provide good quality food and education for her children. To improve her earnings, she contacted Kashf Foundation four years ago. 

Now she has applied for a loan of 30000 PKR to purchase more packs of laces, ribbons, buttons, and spools of threads in various colors. It will enable her to cater to her customers without delay. She wishes to utilize the earned revenue to benefit her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more packs of laces, ribbons, buttons, and spools of threads in various colors.

loans.name: Oyunchimeg

texts.en: Mrs.Oyunchimeg is 55 years old and lives alone in her Ger in the Songinohairhan district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her children are married and live apart from her. She has been running a retail business selling clothes in a local market since 2010. She imports clothes from Erlian, China and sells to local customers in a rental counter at the local market. She has built close relationships with customers and gained their trust over the last 2 years. She is requesting 2'500'000MNT to imports winter clothes for sale to local customers. She is a diligent and honest woman.

loans.use: to import winter clothes for sale to local customers.

loans.name: Safeena

texts.en:
Safeena is 40 years old, married, and has five children. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for six months. She offers various daily use goods at reasonable prices to her customers. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. 

Safeena is requesting her seventh loan for 20,000 PKR, which she will use to buy stocks of rice, grains, and flour from the market at lower rates.  The loan will enable her to meet the increasing demand consistently. She has shown excellent repayment behavior. Safeena wishes to utilize part of revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase her business capital. She is motivated to provide for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice, grains, and flour from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Shafqat

texts.en:
Shafqat is a 46-year-old married woman. Her husband’s income as a daily laborer is barely sufficient to meet her family’s expenses.

Shafqat has been efficiently doing a business of cloth stitching for three years. She started stitching clothes for the women in her vicinity. Adamant about changing her poverty-stricken life, she started her business with an old machine that she got in her dowry. With the passage of time, she has retained many customers.

In order to improve her business, Shafqat contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 25,000. She intends to use this loan to purchase a new stitching machine, as well as spools of thread and zippers in various colors. In this way her earnings will be improved and hence she can better support her family members. She is excited to be able to make double the amount of clothes she used to make. Her daughter, who will soon be free from her exams, uses the old machine to assist her in completing orders in less time.

loans.use: To purchase a new stitching machine, as well as spools of thread and zippers in various colors.

loans.name: Tanzeela

texts.en:
Tanzeela is a 41-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for the last three years. She offers various goods for daily use. Her husband also assists her in buying additional stock from the market. 

Tanzeela is motivated to provide for her family. She wants to grow her business and requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to purchase sacks of rice and flour, as well as packs of beverages to fully stock her store. Then she will be able to meet increasing demand consistently. Tanzeela expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to pay for her daughter's wedding.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of rice and flour, as well as packs of beverages.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 32-year-old married man who lives in Sana'a, Yemen. His business is a cafe, which he has been running for eight years. He offers his customers all types of products, such as hot drinks, fresh juices, and sandwiches. In addition, he has employed five workers in his business. 

Mohammed is good person who has already received a loan from Kiva. He says his business is going to improve gradually. Now, he has applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to increase his business by buying food items which will meet his customers' needs. He thanks Kiva lenders for funding his first loan and he hopes to receive another loan.

loans.use: to buy food items for his business

loans.name: Rosenda Yaneth
