texts.es: Rosenda Yaneth de treinta y uno  años de edad vive junto a sus hijos; ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad como frijoles, leche, pan, pollo, entre otros, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y ya tiene muchos años de tenerlo por lo que ha adquirido experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ventas, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la conocen muy bien y la prefieren por la calidad de los productos que comercia, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Rosenda es una mujer dedicada a su labor, activa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, sabe que para alcanzar sus sueños tiene que esforzarse el máximo y alcanzar el éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere aumentar sus ventas pero para poder invertir necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar fríjoles, pan, golosinas, producto instantáneo, refrescos, etc. Rosenda Yaneth tiene buenas referencias de pago por eso asegura que podrá pagar la deuda y al mismo tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosenda Yaneth, 31, lives with her children. She has a store where she sells staples like beans, milk, bread, and chicken, among others. The business is located in her home and she has had it for several years. She has gained valuable experience, which has allowed her to have better sales. Rosenda has a lot of customers, because people know her well and prefer her for the quality of her products, the accessible prices, and above all, the excellent service.

Rosenda is an active women who is dedicated to her work, and has a lot of desire to move forward. She knows that to achieve her dreams, she has to put in as much effort as she can and reach success. Like all good shopkeepers, she wants to increase her sales, but to be able to invest, she needs capital. This is why she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy beans, bread, candies, instant products, soft drinks, etc. Rosenda Yaneth has good payment references, so she is sure she will be able to pay off the loan and she is also confident that she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beans, bread, candies, instant products, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is a 41-year-old married woman. She is a mother of two daughters and two sons. She is trying hard to fulfill their needs, including food, health, clothing, and education. Yasmeen has been doing a business of waan manufacturing for the past seven years. A waan is a thread-like material that is used in making charpoy (a bedstead of woven webbing or hemp stretched on a wooden frame on four legs). Yasmeen offers various types of waan in different colors and has become famous for providing good quality waan in her community. She is content to do this work for the sake of her family. She also sews as a part-time job. In this way, she is able to handle her family's needs and requirements effectively. 

This is Yasmeen's sixth year with th Kashf Foundation. She is satisfied with the support of the foundation and has applied for a loan of PKR 50,000 to buy good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibers for making good quality waan to increase her sales. Her husband is not in good enough physical shape to be employed. Yasmeen wishes to use a part of her profits for her husband’s healthcare and also wants to provide higher education to her children.

loans.use: To buy good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibers for making good quality waan (a thread-like material) to increase her sales.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es: Cruz de cuarenta cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo, el posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, frijoles, arroz, pan, producto instantáneo, jabón, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además  del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Cruz es un hombre enérgico, trabajador, y con muchas metas por delante, esta dispuesto a esforzarse al máximo pues sabe que solo así podrá cumplir sus sueños y llegar al éxito, como todo buen comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar nuevas inversiones pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, pan, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Cruz tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Cruz is 45 and lives with his life partner and son. For several years, he has had a store in his house where he sells basic items such as beans, rice, bread, instant products, and soap. He has gained valuable sales experience that has increased his income. The store is well known to his many customers, who prefer Cruz's quality products, reasonable prices, and unequaled customer service.

Cruz is energetic, hardworking, and has many goals. He is ready to work very hard because he knows that he will be able to achieve his dreams and be successful this way. Like every good merchant, he wants to grow his business and make new investments, but he lacks sufficient capital. He is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy grains, bread, sweets, instant products, beverages, and soaps. Cruz has a good payment history and assures us that he will be able to pay his debt while offering his household greater financial security.

loans.use: to buy grains, bread, sweets, instant products, beverages, and soaps.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. For 20 years, she has been running a milk sales business with her husband. She started her business at a time when her husband was the only breadwinner. Yasmeen also handles cattle, bringing feed and taking them into the fields, while her husband sells them at different markets at good prices. Now Yasmeen has one cow and four goats. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family as well as financial matters. 

Yasmeen is in her second loan cycle with Kashf Foundation. Her repayment behavior is very good. She has some savings and she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase a buffalo to increase her sales. Yasmeen wishes to provide a good quality education for her children.

loans.use: To purchase a buffalo to increase her milk sales.

loans.name: Yusupjon

texts.ru: Юсупчон  пришел в МДО Арванд , что бы получить кредит для покупки скота.   Он занимается откормом и куплей продажей коз и овец. Из-за нехватки корма  он вынужден был продать свой скот. Теперь ему нужны деньги, что бы купить скот и корм для них. Зимой он будет пасти скот, что бы весной смог продать подороже. Ему больше некуда обращаться за финансовой поддержкой. Он будет очень благодарен, получить  кредит для приобретения скота и корма.
texts.en: Yusupjon has turned to MDO Arvand for a loan to purchase livestock. He raises goats and sheep for resale and was recently forced to sell his animals due to a shortage of fodder. Now Yusupjon needs a loan so that he can build up his herd and purchase fodder for them. He will be letting his animals graze all winter then sell them at a higher price come spring. Yusupjon has nowhere else to turn for financial assistance and he will be very grateful to receive this loan which he will use to purchase livestock and fodder.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Francisco Adalberto

texts.es: Francisco Adalberto de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos,  El posee una venta de hot dog la cual es muy conocida en la localidad ya que vende los panes mas exquisitos, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la preparación y venta, además le ha permitido obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su carretón y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren y lo recomiendan porque saben que todo lo que vende lo elabora con materia prima de calidad y a buenos precios además de un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Francisco es un hombre entregado a su labor, enérgico, muy motivado ya que ama su trabajo, tiene muchas metas que desea lograr y sabe que solo con todo su esfuerzo y valentía podrá alcanzar ese éxito que tanto desea, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y eso lo impulso a realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita pan, embutidos, aderezos, bebidas etc. Francisco Adalberto tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida como se la merecen.
texts.en:
Francisco Adalberto is thirty three years old and lives with his life partner and their children. He has a hot dog business that is very well-known in his town because the bread he uses is really good. He has been running this business for several years and has a lot of experience in food preparation and sales, enabling him to make good profits. He sells from his hot dog cart and has a gained a lot of customers because they like his food and recommend him because they know that he makes it with good quality produce and sells at good prices, as well as offering personalised customer service. 

Francisco is committed, energetic, and motivated because he loves his job. He has a lot of goals that he wants to achieve and knows that he will need all his hard-work and courage to be able to obtain the success he desires. The demand for his products has increased in the last few months making him want to make a new investment. Since he does not have the money to do this, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy bread, sausages, dressings, and drinks. Francisco Adalberto has good repayment references and pledges to repay the loan. He has faith that he will be able to offer his family the quality of life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy bread, sausages, dressings, and drinks for his hot dog cart.

loans.name: Perveen

texts.en:
Ms. Perveen is 45 years old and a mother of three children. For 15 years, Perveen has been running a business of milk sales. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family at a point in time when her husband was the only bread earner. With the passage of time, her sales increased as well as her income. Now she has one buffalo and one cow for milk. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. She also helps her husband in the watering and ploughing of land and cutting of crops. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters, including financial matters. 

Perveen is in her fourth loan cycle with Kashf Foundation. She has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: To purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Barbara Concepcion

texts.es: Bárbara Concepción de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hamacas, de muchos diseños que ella misma crea, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas de la comunidad donde viven,  tiene mucha clientela y la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos  precios y sobre todo por  un buen servicio; Bárbara es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a  su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños ,  todos los días trabaja duro para poder alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, quiere acrecentar el negocio y para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hilos por mayor, cuerda, etc. Bárbara Concepción tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y  la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Bárbara Concepción, 33, lives together with her three children. She makes and sells hammocks with a lot of patterns that she herself creates. She has been in this business for many years and this has given her a lot of sales experience that allows her to earn more money. Her business is located in her home and is very well known among the people in the community where she lives. She has a lot of customers and they prefer her for the quality of her product, the good prices, and above all, the good service.

Bárbara is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work. She has a lot of desire to move forward and make her dreams a reality. Every day, she works hard to achieve success and she will not stop until she is there. She wants to expand her business and for that, she needs capital to back her. This is why she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy wholesale threads, cord, etc. Bárbara Concepción has good payment references and a high moral character. She is sure that she will be able to pay off the loan and is also confident that it will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale threads, cord, and wood.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida is a 38-year-old married woman and a mother of six children.  She has been running a business of milk sales for the past 12 years. Her husband operates a fruit cart, but his income is too low to meet the needs of the eight family members. This forced Sajida to initiate her business to contribute to the family income.  Now she has one buffalo and one cow for milk. She makes enough to lead a decent a life. 

Sajida has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation. She has been in association with Kashf for five years and shown excellent repayment behavior. Currently, she applied a loan of amount PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She wants to use the earned revenue on wedding arrangements for her sons and daughters.

loans.use: buy a buffalo

loans.name: Sonia Marixa

texts.es: Sonia Marixa treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a  su compañero de vida y sus hijos; Ella posee una panadería, vende pan en variedad quesadillas, salpores, pastelitos entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en el rubro y ademas le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable; Sonia es una mujer dedicada a su labor y a su hogar, para ella lo más importante es su familia y quiere que vivan en las mejores condiciones, por eso trabaja dia con dia para llegar al éxito en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y necesita invertir en eso por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, levadura, bandejas, horno etc. Sonia tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se siente feliz con la ayuda y por eso asegura que cancelara el crédito y a la vez le dará a su familia la calidad de vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Sonia Marixa, 35, lives with her life companion and their children.  She has a bakery and sells a variety of bread: ‘quesadillas,’ ‘salpores’ and turnovers, among others.  She’s had the business for several years and has gained valuable experience in the line of work that makes it possible for her to earn the best profits.  She has a large clientele because everything she sells is top quality at affordable prices and her service is unequaled.  Sonia’s a woman who is dedicated to her work and her to her home.  For her, family is most important and she wants them to live in the best possible conditions which is why she works day to day to attain success.  

Demand has increased in recent weeks and she needs to invest which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, trays, an oven, etc.  Sonia has good payment references and is responsible.  She feels happy with the help and is sure to repay the loan while at the same time giving her family the quality of life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, trays and an oven.

loans.name: Vladimer

texts.en:
Vladimer is 55 years old. He lives in a small village of Akhaltsikhe district with his wife and two children (25 and 27 years old). The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have two milk cows, two calves and seven pigs. In addition, Vladimer owns agricultural land, where he grows potatoes, onion, haricot and other kinds of vegetables. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market at a good price. Vladimer is a very hardworking man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. 

Vladimer has requested a loan for purchasing calves. After purchasing the calves, he will raise them in order to resell them at a higher price. This will increase the income of the family so they will be able to improve their living conditions. Vladimer awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase calves, in order to raise and resell them at a higher price.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
In the picture above is Mohamed, who is a businessman in the city of Kenema in Eastern Sierra Leone. Mohamed is a native of Port Loko town, situated in the north of the country. A 49-year-old husband and father, Mohamed sells ready-to-wear clothing. He has been a businessman for 18 years now. His wife is a trader, too. His three children are attending primary and secondary schools. 

Mohamed has requested this loan from Kiva lenders in order to buy women's clothing, jeans, men's shirts and similar items in a large quantity to add to his current stock. In this way, Mohamed will attract more customers to his business, make more sales and better profit. Consequently, his standard of living will improve.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing, jeans, men's shirts, and similar items in a large quantity to add to his current stock.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: In the picture above is Patrick, who is a businessman in the city of Kenema, in Eastern Sierra Leone. Patrick is a native of Kenema city. A 58-year-old husband and father, Patrick sells medicine. He has been in this business for eight years now. His wife is a nurse and four of his children are attending primary and secondary schools. Patrick has requested this loan from Kiva lenders in order to buy a large quantity of medicinal drugs to add to his drug store.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of medicine to add to his drug store inventory

loans.name: Om-Obady Group

texts.en:
Om-Obady is a group which is comprised of four women who are from Taiz, Yemen. They took a loan of 200,000 YER. 

Nagla is 38 years old, married and has nine children. She owns a house and would like to live in comfortable conditions. She is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for her home. Her ambition is to have a retail shop to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for her home.

loans.name: Sarkis

texts.en:
Sarkis is 63 years old. He lives in a small village of Akhaltsikhe with his wife. Both of them are provided with a retirement pension. The family is involved in agricultural business. In particular, they have several milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese production. Additionally, Sarkis owns an agricultural land, where he grows potatoes, haricot and maize. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market at a good price. Sarkis is a very hardworking man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. 

Sarkis has requested a loan for purchasing calves and expanding his dairy business. This will increase the family income so they will be able to improve their living conditions. Sarkis awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase calves and expand dairy business

loans.name: Naif Group

texts.en:
This group is called Naif and consists of three ladies and one man who live in Taiz,Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. 

Najood is 26 years old and lives with her family in Taiz, Yemen. She is married and has three children. She sells incense, perfumes and clothes. She is experienced in sales, which allows her to make a better income. She works hard to offer a good life for her family. She is a resourceful, honest woman dedicated to her work. 

She applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy incense, perfumes, clothes, etc. for her business.

loans.use: to buy incense, perfumes, clothes, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Tea

texts.en:
Tea is 30 years old. She lives in the small village of Akhaltsikhe with her husband, mother and infant child. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they have agricultural land where they grow potatoes and haricots. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market at a good price. Each member of the family works hard and does their best to insure a good harvest. 

Tea requested a loan to purchase milk cows. After purchasing the milk cows, they will get milk and produce dairy products. This will increase the income for the family and they will be able to improve their living conditions. Tea awaits your support

loans.use: buy dairy cows

loans.name: Anzor

texts.en:
Anzor is 37 years old from Adigeni district. Anzor has a large family: wife, daughter, mother, brother, sister-in-law and nephew. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they have several milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese production. In addition, Anzor owns an agricultural land, where he grows potatoes. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market at a good price. Anzor is very hard working man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. 

Anzor requested a loan to purchase two milk cows and expand his dairy business. This will increase the income of the family and they will be able to improve their living conditions. Anzor awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase two milk cows.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: EL CLIENTE TOMAS TIENE SU SEÑORA  PERO NO SON CASADOS Y TIENEN TRES HIJOS, DESDE HACE MUCHOS AÑOS, RADICAN EN EL TRÓPICO DE COCHABAMBA. EL CLIENTE ES DE LA PROVINCIA CHAPARE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA, VINO DE SU COMUNIDAD DE MELGA UNO DE LOS LUGARES MAS POBRES DE BOLIVIA,  COMO LA MAYORÍA DE LAS PERSONAS BUSCANDO MAYOR OPORTUNIDAD DE VIDA, EN SU COMUNIDAD LA PRODUCCIÓN, DEBIDO A LOS CAMBIOS CLIMATOLÓGICOS, ES DIFÍCIL CONTROLAR LA PRODUCCIÓN Y CADA VEZ ES MAS ESCASA, POR LO QUE DECIDIÓ VENIRSE AL TRÓPICO, PERO CON EL TRASCURSO DEL TIEMPO, CON MUCHO TRABAJO Y ESFUERZO SE COMPRO SU LOTE AGRÍCOLA, EN LA QUE HOY EN DÍA TRABAJA EN EL SECTOR AGRÍCOLA Y SE DEDICA A LA PRODUCCIÓN DE PIÑA. EL CRÉDITO QUE ESTA SOLICITANDO ES PARA AMPLIACIÓN  DE PIÑA,  MANTENIMIENTO DE PIÑA Y YUCA DE ESTA MANERA PODRÁ MEJORAR SU NIVEL DE VIDA TAMBIÉN SU SEÑORA SIEMPRE HA ESTADO COLABORANDO EN SUS ACTIVIDADES.(CON LA PERSONA DE A FOTO ES SU SEÑORA)
texts.en: Tomas has his wife but they are unmarried; they have three children.  They’ve lived in El Trópico in Cochabamba for many years.  He’s from Chapare Province in Cochabamba Department.  He came from his community in Melga, one of Bolivia’s poorest places, like most people seeking better life opportunities.  It’s hard to control production in his community due to weather variations and it becomes more and more scarce each time which is why he decided to move to El Trópico.  But as time has passed and with much effort and dedication he was able to buy his piece of farmland and today he works in agriculture producing pineapples.  The loan he’s requesting is to expand the pineapple production and for maintenance of the pineapple and manioc crops to improve his standard of living and also his wife’s who has always collaborated with his work.  (The other person in the photo is his wife.)

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Rolandi

texts.en:
Rolandi is 43 years old and from the Adigeni district. He lives with his wife, who is a librarian. She receives a monthly income for working in a local library. The family is involved in agricultural business. In particular, they have pigs and several milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese production. In addition, Rolandi owns agricultural land where he grows potatoes and cabbage. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market at a good price. Rolandi is very hard working man and does his best to insure in a good harvest. 

Rolandi requested a loan to purchase feed for his cattle. After purchasing feed, the cattle will fatten properly and he will be able to sell the meat. This will increase the income of the family, enabling them to improve their living conditions. Rolandi awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase feed for the cattle

loans.name: Saif

texts.en:
Saif is 50 years old, married man who lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is always happy working hard to offer for his family a good life. 

Saif has a house. He applied for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for his home.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for his home.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 37-year-old, married man, who supports his children. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is an employer. 

His educational background is a bachelor's degree. He gets a low salary that sometimes doesn't enable him to provide for all of his family's needs. He would like to buy home appliances, but he doesn't have sufficient cash. So he is requesting a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy home appliances. 

He wants to study for a master's and enroll his children in private school.

loans.use: to buy appliances for his house.

loans.name: Carlos Armado

texts.es: Carlos de 26 años de edad, vive con su madre. Desde hace 6 años se dedica a la peletería, trabajo que le ha permitido ganarse la vida y generar el sustento para su casa. Laboró por mucho tiempo como empleado y hace 2 años tomó la decisión de montar su propio negocio con el fin generar mayores ingresos que le permitieran ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Carlos es un hombre lleno de sueños, pero asegura que el más importante es poder disfrutar de su madre. Actualmente tiene una gran necesidad y está en búsqueda de un crédito, con el que espera comprar materiales para su negocio debido a la demanda que espera tener en la temporada navideña.
texts.en: Carlos, 26, lives with his mother.  He’s been selling leather for six years, a job that’s made it possible for him to earn a living and generate support for his home.  He worked as an employee for a long time and two years ago decided to start his own business in order to earn higher income that would allow him to provide better quality of life for his family.  Carlos is a man who is full of dreams but he insists that the most important one is to be able to enjoy his mother.  He currently is in great need and is looking for a loan to buy materials for his business because he’s expecting increased demand due to the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Brisas Del Xolotlan Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres microempresarias, una de ellas Magela mujer de 43 años, casada con cuatro hijos tiene una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace 12 años inicio vendiendo helados y choco bananos con sus ganancias fue comprando en menor escala productos de pulperías. En su negocio le ayudan su esposo y unos de sus hijos mayores, este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ropa nueva, zapatos, chinelas y cosméticos por la temporada. Juana vende ropa, cosméticos de la Avon y Ana tiene una pequeña pulpería y vende ropa.
texts.en: This group consists of three micro businesswomen.  One of them is Magela, 43.  She’s married and has four children.  She has a home-based grocery store that she opened 12 years ago selling ice-cream and chocolate-covered bananas.  She used profits to gradually buy more products sold in grocery stores.  Her husband and one of her older children help her with the business and she will use this loan to buy new clothes, shoes, shawls and seasonal cosmetics.  Juana sells clothes and Avon cosmetics and Ana has a small grocery store and sells clothes.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Eliana De Las Misercordias

texts.es: Eliana de 38 años de edad, no le queda grande nada, el ser ama de casa no ha sido impedimento para convertirse en una microempresaria, elabora helados en su casa y su esposo los distribuye por diferentes sectores de la ciudad, además cuenta con un punto de venta en la sala de su casa que ella misma atiende. Esta actividad surgió debido a la necesidad económica a la que se vieron afrontados cuando su esposo se quedó sin empleo. Su mayor sueño es poder tener una heladería y para ello solicitan un crédito que les permita comprar la materia prima para la elaboración de sus helados.
texts.en: Eliana is 38 years old, and nothing is too big for her. Being a housewife has not stopped her from becoming a micro-entrepreneur. She makes ice cream treats from home, and later her husband distributes them in various parts of the city. She also runs a small shop herself out of their home. This business started in order to generate income during a time when her husband was unable to find work. Her greatest dream is to have her own ice cream shop, and as a step in that direction she is requesting a loan that will allow them to purchase the necessary raw material for making her ice cream treats.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials.

loans.name: Consuelo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros microempresarias de éxito una de ella es Brunilda tiene 58 años, madre soltera con cinco hijos casi todos mayores de edad se dedica a elaborar tortilla en su domicilio desde hace 4 años, de estar con la institución tiene 6 años, ella inicio primeramente vendiendo verduras en su casa la idea le surgió ya que  en su comunidad existían pocos negocios de ventas de  tortillas lo que le genero buenas ganancias. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como maíz, leña, cal y frijoles. Consuelo comercializa cosméticos Avon, Zermat, Judith tiene 9 años de vender ropa, perfumes y Maribel vende ropa nueva y variada.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four successful small business women. One of these is Brunilda who is 58 years old and a single mother of five children, most of whom are adults. She has been making tortillas in her home for the past four years and has been with ADIM for six years.

She started by selling vegetables in her house. Then she had the idea to sell tortillas because there were few businesses selling tortillas in her community and she earns a good income from it. She will use the loan to purchase basic ingredients such as corn, firewood, quicklime and beans. 

Other members of the group are Consuelo who sells Avon and Zermat cosmetics, Judith who has been selling clothing and perfume for nine years and Maribel who sells various new clothing.

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, quicklime and beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: María Marleny

texts.es: María Marleny, es una de esas mujeres a la que la vida la ha golpeado incesantemente. Padeció la muerte de su esposo y debido a ello tuvo que aprender el oficio de la confección. Se ha dedicado a la fabricación de sacos y bufandas de lana, actividad que se ha convertido en su única fuente de ingresos. Después de elaborar sus productos ella se desplaza en búsqueda de clientes frecuentando almacenes para ofrecerlos. En estos momentos María solicita un crédito para la compra de lana e hilo con el fin de incrementar sus ventas en la temporada de fin de año, debido a que no cuenta con recursos propios para realizar esta inversión a su negocio.
texts.en: María Marleny is one of those woman whom life has incessantly struck.  She suffered the death of her husband and had to take up sewing.  She makes wool blazers and scarves, and this has become her only source of income.  After making her products she goes out in search of customers, frequenting warehouses.  At this time Maria is asking for a loan to buy wool and thread so that she can increase her sales at the end of the year.  She doesn’t have enough resources to make this investment.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: El Buen Camino Group

texts.es: Es un grupo que está conformado por tres socias y una de ella es Fátima  desde hace 8 años vende ropa y bisuterías es una mujer casada con un hijo en la institución tiene 5 años de ser cliente con un total de 15 préstamos en grupo. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa, zapatos y bisuterías como cadenas, pulseras, anillos etc. Yamileth vende fritanga, refrescos y ropa. Ana tiene una panadería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members, one of whom is Fátima.  She has sold clothing and costume jewelry for eight years.  She's a married woman with a child.  She has been a client of the institution for five years and has a total of 15 group loans.

She's going to invest the loan in clothing, shoes, and costume jewelry such as chains, bracelets, rings, etc.

Yamileth sells fried foods, soda, and clothing.  Ana has a bakery in her home.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, and costume jewelry

loans.name: Martha Nelly

texts.es: Mrtha de 57 años de edad, lo que más le importa en la vida es sacar adelante a su hijo, pese a no haber tenido acceso a la educación aprendió a leer y a escribir y esto le ha ayudado para convertirse en una gran negociante. Labora todos los días de 9 a 7 de la noche como vendedora ambulante en el centro de la ciudad, allí comercia ropa infantil. Su mayor deseo es poder expandir su negocio por lo cual se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que le permita comprar nueva mercancía y generar mayores ingresos para el sustento de su hogar.
texts.en:
Martha is 57 years old. Her largest motivation in life is to give her son a bright future. Even though she could not study, she learned how to read and write, which has helped her become a great saleswoman. She sells clothes for children every day, 9 am to 7 pm, in the streets of the city’s downtown.

Her biggest dream is to expand her business. For this reason, she is requesting a loan that will help her to buy new merchandise and increase her income in order to support her home.

loans.use: to buy clothes for children.

loans.name: El Campanario Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Geovanny que vende cosméticos de la Avon,  Victoria Secret, Body, pinturas de labios actividad que se dedica desde hace 8 años, es casada, tiene 36 años de edad y cuatro hijos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos de la Avon, Victoria Secret, Bodys, pinturas de labios etc. Antonia vende queso, gaseosas, hielo, perfumes y Carla vende ropa nueva.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial members. One of them is Giovanni who sells cosmetics and lipsticks from Avon, Victoria Secret, and Body brands. She has been doing this work for 8 years. She’s married, 36 years old, and has four children. The loan will be used to buy cosmetics and lipsticks from Avon, Victoria Secret, and Body brands. 
Antonia, the second member, sells cheese, soft drinks, ice, and perfumes. Carla, the third member, sells new clothes.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and lipsticks from Avon, Victoria Secret, and Body brands.

loans.name: Rubén Darío

texts.es: “existen personas que se afligen por insignificancias cuando existen otras que esperan ver un mejor mañana a pesar de sus circunstancias” Con esta frase don Rubén comienza a relatarnos su mayor dificultad en la vida. Nació y vivió hasta su juventud en un municipio de Antioquia, en donde fue desplazado por la violencia. Obligado a salir de su pueblo se dirigió a la ciudad en búsqueda de una oportunidad laboral, tras no encontrarla, se dedicó a la venta de fruta en una carreta que le facilitaron. Gracias  a este medio de sostenimiento colocó en el centro de la ciudad un puesto de trabajo en donde comercializa gafas y otros enseres. En la actualidad solicita un crédito para la compra  de artículos para la temporada navideña.
texts.en: "There are people who are anxious about insignificant problems, while others are hopeful to see a better tomorrow despite their circumstances." With this quote, Rubén began telling us about his biggest difficulty in life. He was born and grew up in the municipality of Antioquia, from where he was displaced because of violence. He had to leave his hometown, and went to the city in search of job opportunities. When he didn't find formal work, he began selling fruit from a cart which he was provided with. Thanks to the profit he made in this way, he was able to set up a business in the city center selling glasses and other things. He is requesting a loan right now to use to buy merchandise for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Los Luceros Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias exitosas una de ella es Martha tiene 49 años, es acompañada y tiene tres hijos ya mayores, ella vende mercadería en general como ropa variada, sandalias, cosméticos Avon, productos Arabela actividad que tiene desde hace 15 años. Tiene una mezcla en sus actividades comerciales mientras ofrece sus productos trabaja como promotora de los productos Arabela que le genera otros ingresos para el sustento de su familia. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos, productos Arabela, zapatos hechos en Masaya y ropa. Lizeth vende cosméticos de Arabela y Ana María vende cosméticos de la Vogue y prendas de la Zafiro.
texts.en: This group was formed by a successful group of women.  Martha is one of them.  She is 49 years old and has three adult children.  She sells general merchandise such as clothing, sandals, Avon cosmetics, Arabela products, and has been doing this for 15 years.  She has a mixture of business activities while she offers her products and works as an Arabela promoter.  This brings her other income with which to sustain her family.  She will use the money from this loan to buy cosmetics, Arabela products, shoes made in Masaya and clothing.  Lizeth sells Arabela cosmetics and Ana Maria sells Vogue cosmetics and Zafiro clothing.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Las Palomitas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios microempresarios que uno de ellos es Maritza que desde hace 16 años se dedica a vender fritanga en su domicilio, además hace y  entrega enchiladitas a los colegios cercano a su comunidad, tiene 41 años de edad es casada y con 4 hijos entre mayores y menores de edad. Su esposo y una de sus hijas le ayudan a trabajar en el negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de una estufa, maíz, leña, aceite, Ana vende productos lácteos en su domicilio y Francisco tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three small business members, one of whom is Maritza, who has worked selling traditional meals from her home since she was 16 years old.  In addition, she makes and delivers enchiladitas (stuffed and fried tortillas) to the secondary schools near her community.  She is 41 years old, married, and has 4 children, some of whom are young enough to live at home.  Her husband and one of her daughters helps her work in her business, and she plans to use this loan to buy a new stove, corn, firewood, and oil.  Ana sells dairy products from her home, and Fransisco has a small grocery store in his house.

loans.use: to buy a stove, corn, firewood, oil, etc.

loans.name: Cipres Group

texts.es: Es un grupo formado por tres socias  y una de ellas es Dolores quien tiene una pulpería en su casa desde hace 6 meses anteriormente trabajaba como domésticas y con su salario fue ahorrando hasta que logro poner su pulpería ya que soñaba con tener su propio negocio para estar cerca de sus hijos y cuidarlos más de cerca, el crédito lo invertirá en reforzar su inventario de la pulpería como es la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, productos lácteos, leña, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño entre otros, Amanda tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, Nereyda vende recargas de tiempo aire para celulare
texts.en:
This is a group formed of three members.  One of them is Dolores who has had a home-based grocery store for six months.   She used to work as a domestic and saved up part of her salary until she was able to set up her grocery store since she’d always dreamed of having her own business to be able to stay near her children and watch them more closely.  She will use the loan to strengthen her grocery inventory; she will buy basic grains like rice, beans, sugar, oil, dairy products, firewood, laundry soap and bath soap, among others.  

Amanda has a grocery store at home and Nereyda sells mobile phone air time recharge cards

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Francis Group

texts.es: Son cuatro microempresarios emprendedores como es el caso de Francis Carolina quien vende cosméticos de la Avon. Inicio hace dos años haciendo y vendiendo nacatamales los cuales hasta el día de hoy tiene esas dos actividades, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos Avon, y materia prima para hacer nacatamales como hojas, carne de cerdo, papas, arroz, especies, leñas, etc. Francisco tiene un tramo de ropa usada en un mercado local de la capital, Margarita vende sopas los fines de semana y frijoles cocidos, Fanny vende artículos ferreteros.
texts.en:
They are four enterprising small business people like Francis Carolina.  She sells Avon cosmetics.  She started doing this two years ago, and she also sells ‘nacatamales’ [made from corn meal and stuffed with rice, meat, potatoes, olives, capers, and other ingredients, and wrapped in banana leaves].  To this day she has both of these business activities.

She will use the loan to buy Avon cosmetics and raw materials to make nacatamales.  She will buy things like banana leaves, pork, potatoes, rice, spices, and firewood, etc.

Francisco has a business selling used clothes at a market in the capital.  Margarita sells soup and cooked beans on the week-ends.  Fanny sells hardware items.

loans.use: to buy Avon cosmetics and raw materials like banana leaves, pork, potatoes, rice, spices, and firewood, etc. to make nacatamales.

loans.name: Mujeres Victoriosas Group

texts.es: Es un grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Ana mujer de 56 años de edad, casada y con tres hijos ya mayores vende desde hace 20 años ropa nueva, zapatos y ropa usada. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de pacas de ropas usada, zapatos, chinelas y ropa nueva, Concepción vende ropa usada ambulante, Guadalupe vende ropa, zapatos por encargo también vende repostería gaseosa ambulante.
texts.en:
This is a group of three members.  One of them is Ana, 56.  She’s married and has three adult children.  She’s been selling used clothes, new clothes and shoes for twenty years.  She will use the loan to buy bales of used clothes, shoes, slippers and new clothes.  
Concepción sells used clothes from place to place and Guadalupe sells clothes and shoes on order and also sells pastries and soft-drinks from place to place.

loans.use: to buy used clothes, shoes, slippers and new clothes.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
María tiene 24 años de edad, es madre soletera de dos hijos. Ella se dedica a prestar sus servicios como ama de casa a personas que pagan por esos servicios. Ella es una persona responsable y es su primer crédito.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar madera, 130 tejas, clavos y pago de mano de obra; para reparar el techo de su casa. De esta manera, podrá tener una casa más digna para su familia, que vivan más cómodos. Entre sus planes están, continuar mejorando su casa, instalar una granja de gallinas ponedoras y pollos de engorde.
texts.en:
María is 24 years old and is a single mother of two children. She makes a living as a housekeeper for people who pay her for such services. She is a responsible person and this is her first loan. 

The loan that she is applying for from Fundación Campo is to buy wood, 130 shingles, nails and to pay for labor to repair the roof of her house. This way, she may have a more dignified house for her family, so that they may live more comfortably. 

Among her other plans are to continue improving her house and to build a farm of laying and broiler hens.

loans.use: to buy wood, 130 shingles, nails and to pay for labor to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Esfuerzate Y Se Valiente Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Adelaida quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 35 años es madre soltera y tiene 63 años de edad, actualmente cuenta con otra actividad como es la comercialización de cosméticos de la Avon que le permite mejorar sus ingresos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos Avon como perfumen, crema para cuerpo y manos, colonias, champo y productos de pulperías como granos básicos arroz, aceite, frijoles, azúcar, medicamentos populares entre otros, Yamileth vende sopas los fines de semanas, enchiladas, tacos y Christian vende ropa usada.
texts.en:
This is a group of three entrepreneurs.  One of them is Adelaida who has had a grocery store for 35 years.  She’s a single mother and is 63-years-old.  She currently has a second occupation which is selling Avon products that makes it possible for her to improve her income.  She will use the loan to buy Avon products like perfume, body and hand creams, cologne, shampoo and also to buy stock merchandise for the grocery store like rice, oil, beans, sugar, popular medicines and others.  

Yamileth sells soup, enchiladas and tacos on weekends and Christian sells used clothes.

loans.use: to buy basic staples for her grocery store.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Xiomara de 33 años de edad, acompañada con dos hijos se dedica a vender ropa interior de dama, caballeros y de niño desde hace un año solicita crédito para invertir en ropa interior para todas las edades y sexo, Xóchitl vende ropa, cosméticos de la Avon , Ana Julia tiene un taller de costura.
texts.en:
A group formed by three members.  One of them is Xiomara, 33.  She has two children and has been selling women’s, men’s and children’s underwear for a year.  She requests a loan to buy underwear for all ages and genders.

Xóchitl sells clothes and Avon products and Ana Julia has a sewing workshop.

loans.use: to buy women's, men's and children's underwear.

loans.name: En Dios Haremos Prohezas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros socias una de ellas es Elizabeth que desde hace 4 años vende cosméticos de la Avon, inicio vendiendo ropa nueva. Este crédito lo solicita  para comprar cosméticos de la Avon como perfume, colonia, crema para la cara, cremas para el cuerpo y manos, María Luisa vende productos de Arabela, Marlín vende chinelas y cosméticos Avon, María Denis vende ropa usada de paca, y materiales de construcción.
texts.en:
The group is formed by four female members, one of whom is Elizabeth. For four years she has been selling Avon cosmetics, however, she started off selling new clothing. She is requesting this loan to buy Avon cosmetics, such as perfume, cologne, facial cream, body and hand creams. 

María Luisa sells Arabela products, Marlíng sells slippers and Avon cosmetics, and María Denis sells sets of used clothing and construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase Avon cosmetics, such as perfume, colognes, etc.

loans.name: Boanerge Hernán

texts.es:
Boanerge tiene 21 años de edad, esta acompañado. Se dedica  a la producción de leche, tiene cinco vacas de ordeño y cuenta con tres años de estar ejerciendo esta labor. Inicio comprando ganado, vendió una cerda que le habían regalado, cuando trabajo con cerdos, le gusto y se dedico a criar animales, luego compro una ternera y poco a poco fue adquiriendo más animales hasta el momento posee 14.  Además, se dedica a cultivar maíz y maicillo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una picadora de pasto, él tiene una parte del dinero y con el préstamo podrá completar lo que le falta para adquirirla. Con la inversión, podrá tener disponible la picadora, para realizar todos sus trabajos reduciendo tiempo y costos. Además, obtendrá ingresos extras ya que también prestara el servicio a otras personas. Su meta es contar con 11 vacas de ordeño, por lo menos dentro de un año.
texts.en:
Boanerge is 21 years old and is in a relationship.  He has worked producing milk for three years, and has five dairy cows.  He started by buying livestock, selling a sow that had been given to him when he worked with pigs, liked the work and began raising animals.  Later he bought a heifer, gradually acquiring more animals to reach the 14 he has today.  He also grows corn and sorghum.

The loan Boanerge is requesting from Fundación Campo will be used to buy a grass shredder.  He already has part of the money, and this loan will give him the remaining money he needs to buy it.  This investment will provide him with a grass shredder to do all of his work, reducing time and costs.  In addition, he will earn extra income since he will also render this service to others.  His goal is to have at least 11 dairy cows within a year.

loans.use: to buy a grass shredder.

loans.name: Las Puntuales Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias una de ellas es Karen tiene 23 años es soltera y desde hace cinco años se dedica a vender cosméticos de la Avon, Vogue, Zermat el crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosméticos como crema para mano y cara, perfumen, colonia etc. Jhoseling vende ropa usada, Alejandrina vende verduras en su casa y cosméticos de la Avon.
texts.en:
This group is formed by three members, one of whom is Karen. She is 23 years old and single and for five years she has sold cosmetics from Avon, Vogue, and Zermat. She is requesting the loan to buy cosmetics such as hand and face cream, perfume, cologne, etc. 

Jhoselyng sells used clothing, and Alejandrina sells vegetables in her house and Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy Avon cosmetics such as hand cream, face cream, perfume, cologne, etc.

loans.name: Francela Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Olivia actualmente tiene una pulpería y un puesto de Enabas en su casa. Inicia su negocio hace 33 años la cual trabajaba en fábrica de telares y con su liquidación invirtió  en verduras frescas poco a poco con sus ganancias fue comprando productos para pulpería, le ayuda unas de sus hijas, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, queso, productos lácteos, papel higiénicos, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño etc. Nora vende refrescos y hace sopas los fines de semana y Jahaira tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three enterprising members.  Olivia is one of them.  She currently has a grocery store and an Enabas kiosk at her house.  She started her business 33 years ago.  

She used to work at a fabric factory.  She used her severance pay and invested in fresh vegetables.  Little by little she was buying products for her grocery store.  One of her daughters helps her.

She will use the loan to buy basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, cooking oil, cheese, dairy products, toilet paper, detergent, and bath soap, etc.

Nora sells soft drinks and makes soup on the week-ends.  Jahaira has a grocery store at her house.

loans.use: to buy basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, and chicken, etc.

loans.name: Vianka Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Vianka mujer de 30 años con dos hijos y madre soltera inicio su negocio vendiendo solamente cosméticos de la Avon hace 4 años, actualmente tiene una pequeña tienda con una variedad de productos, su mama y ella echan tortilla que eso le genera otros ingresos quienes han mejorado su casa poco a poco con las ganancias que le generan los negocios, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa, zapatos, cosméticos, sandalias entre otros, Alba vende comida chatarra y actualmente vende ropa nueva y usada, carteras usadas y fajas de cueros hechas en Masaya y Flor de María vende prendas de platas, sandalias de cueros hechas en Masaya.
texts.en:
This group was formed by three enterprising partners. One of them is Vianka, a 30 year old woman with two children and a single mother. She started her business selling only Avon cosmetics 4 years ago. Currently she has a small store with a variety of products. She and her mother make tortillas which generates other revenue for them. They have improved their house little by little with the profits that their businesses generate. They will invest the loan in the purchase of clothes, shoes, cosmetics and sandals, among other items. 

Alba sells junk food and currently sells new and used clothing, used handbags and leather corsets made in Masaya. Flor de María sells silver jewelry and leather sandals made in Masaya.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes, shoes, sandals, etc.

loans.name: La Suerte Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Liseth es una mujer casada, con dos hijos y tiene la edad de 28 años es estilista a domicilio y vende cosméticos de la Avon desde hace 8 años, el crédito lo invertirá en materia prima como algodón, acetona, toallas, tintes, champo etc. Sadia tiene una mini pulpería y echa tortilla en su casa, María del Rosario vende cereales, pinol, pinolillo, leche de soya y hace sopas los fines de semana, Rosa Virginia vende cosméticos de la Zermat.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four entrepreneurial members. One of them is Liseth. She is twenty-eight years old and is married with two children. She is a stylist, who provides services to her clients in their own homes. She also sells Avon brand cosmetics, which she has been doing for the past 8 years. She will use the loan to invest in materials such as cotton balls, nail polish remover, towels, hair dye, shampoo, etc. 

Sadia has a small grocery store and she makes tortillas to sell from her house.  Maria del Rosario sells cereals, pinol (a traditional drink made with toasted cornmeal), pinolillo (a traditional drink made with toasted cornmeal and mixed with ground cacao), soy milk and on the weekends she makes soups to sell. Rosa Virginia sells Zermat brand cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy supplies like hair dye, cotton balls, nail polish remover, shampoo and Avon brand cosmetics.

loans.name: Ilse Berman

texts.es: Ilse mujer de de 33 años de edad es una microempresaria emprendedora que desde hace 10 años tiene un comedor ubicado cerca al cementerio central de  la capital, es casada con hijos de 13, 4, 9 y  2años de edad. Recibe el apoyo de su esposo y unos de sus hijos de mayor edad en su negocio. Inicio vendiendo enchiladas en un carretón en la acera del cementerio, luego le dieron una casetita pequeña para cubrirse del sol la lluvia y actualmente cuenta con una caseta más grande que se ha convertido en un comedor con sillas y mesas y es muy reconocido en el sector, el crédito lo invertirá como es de costumbre en nuestro  país  el 2 de noviembre es el día de los difuntos  se visitan los cementerios quiere invertir en flores naturales y la compra de un freezer, gaseosas, y granos básicos para su comedor.
texts.en: Ilse, 33, is an enterprising, micro businesswoman who has had an eatery for ten years located near the capital’s central cemetery.  She’s married and has children who are 13, 4, 9 and 2 years of age.  Her husband and one of her older children helps her with the business.  She started out selling enchiladas in a cart on the sidewalk near the cemetery and then they gave her a small stand to protect herself from the sun and the rain.  Now, she has a larger stand that she’s turned into an eatery with tables and chairs; it’s very well-known in the sector.  She will use the loan because it’s a custom in the country for people to visit their dead on November 2 and she wants to buy natural flowers and to buy a freezer, soft-drinks and basic grains for her eatery.

loans.use: to buy flowers, a 500-pound freezer, soft-drinks, basic grains, beef and chicken.

loans.name: Aracelly Del Carmen

texts.es: Aracely desde hace 5 años de tener pulpería en su domicilio, inicio vendiendo gaseosas una amiga le oriento que sacara prestamos fue beneficiada lo que invirtió en la pulpería. Es madre casada con dos hijos uno de 01y 6años de edad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de juguetes, granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño, papel higiénico, pampers, carne de res, carne de pollo, perecederos, verduras etc.
texts.en: Aracely has had a grocery store at home for five years.  She started out selling soft drinks and a girlfriend guided her towards loans that she invested in a grocery store.  She’s a married mother of two children, a one-year-old and a six-year-old.  She will use the loan to buy toys, basic grains like rice and  beans, sugar, oil, laundry soap, bath soap, toilet paper, Pampers [diapers], beef, chicken, perishables, vegetables, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es: Cristhian es una microempresaria que vende comida, hecha tortilla  y vende ropa en su domicilio, actividad que viene realizando desde hace cinco años, es una mujer que tiene tres hijos menores de 02, 06, 03 años de edad, quien con su trabajo aporta al sustento de su familia, solicita crédito para invertir en su negocio como es la compra de maíz por quintal, leñas, cal, ropa variada para todas las edades, tamaños y sexo.
texts.en: Cristhian is a small business woman who sells food, makes and sells tortillas and sells clothing by going house to house. She has been involved in these businesses for the past five years. She has three young children who are 2, 3 and 6 years old. Thanks to her businesses she is able to contribute to supporting her family. She has requested a loan to invest in her business, by purchasing corn in 100 lb quantities, firewood, lime, and a variety of clothing for all ages, sizes and sexes.

loans.use:
to buy corn, firewood, lime and a variety of clothing for all ages. 

el credito lo invertira en la compra de maiz, leñas, cal, ropa variada para todas las edades

loans.name: Aracely Del Socorro

texts.es: Mujer microempresaria de éxito como lo es Aracely se dedica a vender mercadería en general como es ropa, cosméticos, calzado por encargos a vecinos, amigos de  la comunidad, tiene además una pulpería desde hace 7 años y un puesto de ENABAS en su casa. Tiene tres hijos de 02, 15 y 10años  quienes le ayudan en el negocio. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, pampers, cosméticos de la Avon, ropa, zapatos, sandalias etc.
texts.en: Aracely is a successful micro businesswoman who sells general merchandise like clothes, cosmetics and footwear to order to neighbors and friends in the community.  She also has had a grocery store for 7 years and an ENABAS [government food program] stand at home.  She has three children who are 2, 15 and 10 years of age who help her in the business.  She will use the loan to buy basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, oil, Pampers [diapers], Avon cosmetics, clothes, shoes, sandals, etc.

loans.use: to buy clothes, cosmetics and shoes.

loans.name: Ileana Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ileana es una microempresaria emprendedora que se dedica a vender en un mercado más populoso de la capital papel higiénico, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño, gaseosas, actividad que viene realizando desde hace 3 años.

Tiene dos hijos a cargo uno de 04 y 15 años de edad, su esposo y su hijo mayor le ayudan a vender en su negocio, inició su negocio vendiendo solamente agua helada ambulante y actualmente tiene un lugar fijo en el mercado donde vende variedad de productos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de papel higiénico, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño, hace, detergente etc.
texts.en:
Ileana is an entrepreneurial micro-businesswoman who makes a living selling toilet paper, laundry soap, bath soap, and soft drinks in one of the most populous markets in the capital. She has been carrying out this business for three years.

She has two children in her care who are 4 and 15 years old. Her husband and her older son help her make sales in her business. She started her business as a street vendor selling only cold water and now she has a fixed location in the market where she sells a variety of products. 

She will invest the loan in the purchase of toilet paper, laundry soap, bath soap, detergent, etc.

loans.use: to buy toilet paper, laundry soap, bath soap, and soft drinks

loans.name: Wence

texts.es:
Wence tiene 55 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura junto a su padre, debido a que él es el único varón de la familia y tenia que ayudar a su padre. Al ser mayor de edad, se caso y se independizo de sus padres y ejerciendo labores agrícolas, criando cerdos y bovinos. 

Los insumos agrícolas, los adquiere en una ciudad que esta a cinco kilómetros de su casa; luego paga transporte particular para llevar los insumos hasta su casa. El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos bovinos para repasto.

Cuando estén gordos, él los venderá y recibirá un ingreso extra por eso. Lo que más desea es brindarles el estudio a sus hijos y construir una casa.
texts.en: Wence, 55, is married and has four children.  He started working in agriculture alongside his father while still very young because he’s the only male in the family and he had to help his father.  When he became an adult and got married he became independent from his parents and worked in agriculture, raising pigs and cattle.  He buys his farm supplies in a city that’s five kilometers from his house and pays for private transportation to bring the supplies home.  The loan he’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy two head of grazing cattle.  When they are fat, he’ll sell them to earn extra income.  What he most wants is to provide schooling for his children and to build a house.

loans.use: to buy two head of grazing cattle.

loans.name: Martha Ines

texts.es: Doña Martha es soltera tiene 5 hijos todos casados e independientes, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y activa, a su edad trabaja vendiendo ropa en Managua y viaja a una zona de la costa del Caribe de Nicaragua a comercializar sus productos, también alquila cuartos para poder obtener un ingreso regular, ya que las cosas cada vez son más caras hoy en día, doña Martha solicita este crédito para realizar baños en los cuartos de sus inquilinos que es lo que les hace falta para una mejor condición sanitaria, instalar servicios higiénicos, para tal objetivo necesita comprar cemento, arena, bloques, piedra, cantera, hierro, tubos pvc, inodoros y sus accesorios.
texts.en:
Martha is a single woman with five children, who are all married and independent.  She is very hardworking and active, working at her age selling clothes in Managua and travelling to an area of the Caribbean coast of Nicaragua to sell her products.  She also rents rooms to have a regular income, since things are more and more expensive these days.  

Martha is requesting this loan in order to install bathrooms and toilet facilities in the rooms of her tenants, which is needed to improve sanitary conditions.  For this purpose, she needs to buy cement, sand, blocks, stone, quarry stone, iron, PVC pipes, toilets and accessories.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks, stone, quarry stone, iron, PVC pipes, toilets and accessories.

loans.name: Mario Roberto

texts.es:
Don Mario tiene 55 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde la edad de los 12 años se dedica a la agricultura junto a sus dos hermanos. Su niñez fue muy dura, ya que su padre no vivía con ellos, por lo que él y sus dos hermanos mayores trabajaban para mantener a su mamá y a sus otros hermanos menores. Trabajaban como empleados de otras personas; pero en la medida que trascurrió el tiempo él se caso y empezó a trabajar en lo propio, junto a su esposa e hijos mayores. 

Para comprar los insumos agrícolas, tiene que viajar a una ciudad que esta a cinco kilómetros de su casa; luego paga transporte particular para llevar los insumos hasta su casa. El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos bovinos. Desea comprar los bovinos, ya que quiere aprovechar el pasto que posee para alimentarlos y venderlos posteriormente para recibir un ingreso extra; para brindar un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Mario, 55, is married and has four children.  From the age of 12 he has earned a living in agriculture along with his two brothers.  His childhood was difficult because his father didn't live with them, so he and his two brothers worked to support their mother and their younger siblings.  They worked as employees of other people, but as time went by he got married and began to work on his own with his wife and older children.

To buy agricultural supplies he has to travel to a city five kilometers from his house, then pay for private transportation to get the supplies home.

The loan he's requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy two bovines.  He wants to buy the bovines to make the most of the pasture he owns.  He'll feed them and then sell them so he has an additional income, to give his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy two bovines

loans.name: Johana Maria

texts.es: Doña Johana es casada su esposo trabaja como conductor en una institución del gobierno, tienen 4 hijos todos ya casados y trabajan, ella vende ropa en el mercado, su crédito anterior lo utilizo para construir un muro, ahora este otro préstamo lo utilizara para terminar parte de la construcción de su casa ya que todavía le falta poner y necesita comprar puertas de madera, varillas torneadas, tubos redondos, para hacer enverjado y la puesta de las ventanas por lo que requiere invertir en lo mencionado para mayor seguridad de su familia y seguir creciendo poco a poco con ayuda de Kiva y Afodenic.
texts.en: Mrs. Johana is married and her husband works as a driver for a government institution.  They have four children all already married and working.  She sells clothing in the market.  Her previous credit was used to build a wall, and now with this other loan she will use it to finish the construction of her house since she still needs to buy wooden doors, decorative window bars, and round pipes in order to make the trellis and the window casings.  For that reason she needs to invest in the aforementioned items in order to provide greater security for her family and to continue growing little by little with the help of Kiva and Afodenic.

loans.use: to buy wooden doors, decorative window bars, and round pipes in order to make the trellis and the window casings.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Doña maría tiene 45 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración de pasteles que comercializa en la calle, desde muy pequeña doña María perdió a sus padres, vivió toda su infancia con sus padrinos Don Lucho y Doña Maura los cuales le apoyaron en sus estudios para la elaboración de pasteles, de muy pequeña doña María le gustaba la elaboración de pasteles es por ese motivo teniendo los conocimientos necesarios emprendió su negocio, está casada con Don José Benito hace 10 años, y tienen 5 hijos Piter de 10 años, Ana de 8 años , Jose de 6 años , Julia  de 3 años y el menor Adrián de 1 año, el cual se enfermó de una infección estomacal, la familia no cuenta con seguro médico motivo por el cual gastaron todo su capital de operación para curar la enfermedad de su hijo. El presente crédito es justamente para su capital operación compra de Harina, Huevos, Levaduras, saborizantes y otros que necesitan con suma urgencia para poder elaborar los pasteles y salir a comercializarlos.
texts.en: María, 45, works making cakes that she sells in the street.  She lost her parents when she was very little and spent her childhood with her godparents, Lucho and Maura, who supported her cake-making courses.  Since she was little, María enjoyed baking cakes so she had the necessary skills to start her business.  She’s been married to José Benito for ten years and they have five children: Piter, 10, Ana, 8, José, 6, Julia, 3 and Adrián, 1, who got sick with a stomach infection and the family has no medical insurance so they spent all their working capital to cure their son’s illness.  The present loan is precisely for working capital: to buy flour, eggs, yeast, flavoring agents and others needed very urgently to make cakes and go out and sell them.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, yeast and flavoring agents.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel tiene 48 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado, le enseño su padre a realizar estas labores; para que se ganara la vida. Después, Daniel se caso y empezó a trabajar por su propia cuenta, después llegaron sus hijos y trabajo junto a ellos. Hoy en día su trabajo se ha duplicado ya que su hijo ya no esta con él.  

Los insumos agrícolas, los compra en una ciudad que esta a 10 kilómetros de su casa, los traslada a su casa en vehiculo; una vez están ahí paga a una persona que posee carreta para llevarlos al lugar en donde tiene sus cultivos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para mejorar el techo y la infraestructura de su vivienda. Su propósito, es brindar seguridad a su familia y comodidad. Él desea, además brindar el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en: Daniel, 48, is married and has four children.  Since he was little he’s worked in agriculture and raising cattle; his father taught him how to do this work so he’d have a way to earn a living.  Later, Daniel got married and started to work on his own and then children came and he worked with them.  Today, his work has doubled because his son is no longer with him.  He buys his farm supplies in a city ten kilometers away and transports them home in a vehicle.  Once there he pays a person who owns a cart to take them to the place where his fields are.  The loan he’s asking Fundación Campo for is to repair the roof and improve his house’s infrastructure.  His goal is to provide safety and comfort for his family.  He also wants to provide schooling for his children.

loans.use: to improve the roof and his house's infrastructure.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: EL CLIENTE JORGE ES SOLTERO, DESDE HACE AÑOS, RADICAN EN EL TRÓPICO DE COCHABAMBA, EN SU SINDICATO PUERTO FLORES DE MUNICIPIO DE ENTRE RIOS, DESDE 11 AÑOS. EL CLIENTE ES DE LA PROVINCIA CHAPARE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA, UNO DE LOS LUGARES MAS POBRES DE BOLIVIA, VINO DE SU COMUNIDAD DE CHAQUELI CARRASCO COMO LA MAYORÍA DE LAS PERSONAS BUSCANDO MAYOR OPORTUNIDAD DE VIDA, EN SU COMUNIDAD LA PRODUCCIÓN BAJO DEBIDO A LOS CAMBIOS CLIMATOLÓGICOS, DIFÍCIL DE CONTROLAR, CADA VES LA PRODUCCIÓN BAJO Y ESCASEO, POR LO QUE DECIDIÓ IR AL TRÓPICO, PERO CON EL TRASCURSO DEL TIEMPO, CON MUCHO TRABAJO Y ESFUERZO SE COMPRO SU LOTE AGRÍCOLA, EN LA QUE HOY EN DÍA TRABAJA EN EL SECTOR AGRÍCOLA. EL CRÉDITO QUE ESTA SOLICITANDO ES PARA MANTENIMIENTO DE PLÁTANO DE  ESTA MANERA PODRÁ MEJORAR SU NIVEL DE VIDA TAMBIÉN HA ESTADO SIEMPRE COLABORANDO EN SU SINDICATO QUE REALIZAN SUS ACTIVIDADES ECONÓMICAS EN SU SINDICATO.
texts.en: Jorge has been single for years and has lived in the Cochabamba tropics in Puerto Flores Syndicate in the Entre Ríos Municipality for 11 years.  He’s from Chapare Province in Cochabamba Department, one of the poorest parts of Bolivia.  He came from his community of Chaqueli Carrasco like most people seeking better life opportunities.  Production dropped in his community due to weather changes that were hard to control; production dropped more each time and became scarce which is why he decided to move to the tropics.  With time and much effort and hard work, he was able to buy his parcel of farmland and he now works in the agricultural sector.  The loan he’s asking for is for banana crop maintenance so that he can improve his standard of living; he’s also always cooperated with his syndicate in doing the common work the syndicate does.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: María Mabil

texts.es: Mabil es una mujer de 34 años de edad a la que le ha tocado ponerle la cara a la vida, a sus 14 años comenzó a laborar como empleada doméstica debido a las dificultades económicas que padecía su familia.  Durante dos años se dedicó al cuidado de niños interna, lo cual le permitió ahorrar y montar su propio negocio de ebanistería, arte que aprendió al lado de su cuñado. Su mayor deseo es estudiar, pero necesita incrementar sus ventas para poder sostener su carrera, por este motivo ha recurrido a la solicitud de un crédito para la compra de materiales que le permitan aumentar su número de ventas y ganancias.
texts.en: Mabil, 34, is a woman who’s had to face life.  At the age of 14 she started working as a domestic employee due to the economic problems her family was going through.  During two years she worked as a live-in babysitter which made it possible for her to save and start her own cabinet-making business, a skill she learned alongside her brother-in-law.  Her greatest wish is to study but she needs to increase sales in order to pay for a career and this is why she’s called on a loan request to buy materials that will allow he to increase sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es una persona joven y muy trabajadora, tiene 31 años de edad y actualmente vive en la casa de su madre, proviene de una familia pobre que emigro hace mas de 10 años de la mina Kami, que por razones de la vida, murió su padre y quedo viuda la madre, desde ahí la madre se hizo cargo de sus hijos. Es por esto que Juan tubo que muchísimo esfuerzo para superarse, donde tuvo que trabajar y estudiar a la vez, hoy en día cuenta con su propio taller de inyección electrónica donde se dedica a  la reparación de vehículos con partes electrónicas que hoy en día existen varios por el tipo de trabajo y el avance en la tecnología Juan tiene que renovar constantemente sus herramientas de trabajo por el cual el necesita un credito, el taller esta ubicado en la ciudad de Quillacollo-Cochabamba, donde es muy reconocido por la calidad en su trabajo y su disponibilidad de tiempo para poder auxiliar a los vehículos varados en la carretera.
texts.en: Juan is a young, hardworking man.  He’s 31-years-old and currently lives in his mother’s house.  He comes from a poor family that emigrated more than ten years ago from the Kami mine.  Due to life’s fate, his father died leaving his mother widowed and since then she was left in charge of the children.  This is why Juan had to strive mightily to get ahead; he had to work and go to school at the same time.  Today, he owns his electronic fuel injection repair shop where he works repairing vehicles with electronic parts of which there are many nowadays.  Because of the advances in technology and the type of work Juan does, he must constantly upgrade his work tools which is why he needs this loan.  His shop is located in the city of Quillacollo-Cochabamba and he’s very well-known for the quality of his work and his availability to be able to help vehicles that break down on the highway.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Deisy Liliana

texts.es: Leidy de 22 años de edad es madre soltera, su esposo la abandonó dejándola con un bebe de 13 meses. Ella no ha terminado sus estudios de secundaria, por lo cual le han cerrado las puertas para una oferta laboral. Debido a su situación, ella decidió vender productos por catálogo, lo cual le permite dedicarle el tiempo necesario a su hija y obtener los ingresos para su sostenimiento. Ella desea realizar un crédito para comprar surtido en esta temporada de fin de año, con el cual espera incrementar sus ganancias y poderle ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Su mayor sueño es poder terminar su secundaria e ingresar a la universidad porque está segura que es la única forma de ofrecerle un mejor porvenir a su hija.
texts.en: Leidy is 22 years old and is a single mother.  Her husband abandoned her leaving her with a 13 month old baby.  She has not finished high school, and for that reason doors have closed to her for offers of work.  Due to her situation, she decided to sell products via catalogue.  That allows her to dedicate the necessary time to her daughter and to obtain income for their sustenance.  She needs credit in order to buy inventory during this holiday season.  She hopes to use the inventory to increase her income and to be able to offer her family a better quality of life.  Her greatest dream is to be able to finish high school and enroll in the University because she is sure that education is the only thing that will offer a better future for her daughter.

loans.use: To purchase inventory.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es: La señora Susana tiene 45 años de edad, vive con su esposo Fermín, su domicilio esta ubicado en la comunidad Cañón largo a unos 45 km de la Ciudad de Monteagudo. Sus principales actividades son la cría de cerdos mejorados y producción de maíz, los cerdos los crían en corrales rústicos, el maíz una parte lo almacena  para el alimento de sus cerdos lo restante lo vende, ahora la cliente esta solicitando crédito para poder sembrar maíz ya que nos encontramos en época para esta actividad, para que así tenga alimento para su ganado mas allá. Susana y Fermín tienen 4 hijas que se encuentran actualmente estudiando, es por eso que ellos tienen que trabajar y mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos de estudios, útiles, ropas y otros de sus hijas que  tienen y puedan continuar estudiando, hasta concluir sus estudios y salir profesionales para tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Susana is 45 years old. She lives with her husband Fermín. Her home is located in the community of Cañón about 45 kilometers from the city of Monteagudo.

Her main work is in the development of raising pigs and the production of corn. The pigs are raised in rustic pigpens, and the corn is a part of the stockpile for the pig feed and the remainder is sold. She is asking for a loan in order to grow corn and it is the season for this activity, so that there is food for the livestock later.

Susana and Fermín have four daughters who are school students, and that is why they have to work and improve their earnings in order to cover the school expenses, school supplies, clothing and other expenses their daughters have so they can continue studying, to complete their studies and to depart as professionals in order to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies in order to grow corn to feed her pigs and to sell.

loans.name: Hector De Jesús
